触发 You fail (but don't critically fail) a saving throw against an effect with the visual trait.

You cause your eyes to liquefy and run out of your eye sockets, leaving them empty. You get a success on the save against the triggering effect, but you are blinded for the duration the effect would have had on a failure. At that time, your eyes regrow and your normal vision returns.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2mww0DmokYJXUEoA]{Ooze Empathy} 专长 8

先决条件 Oozemorph Dedication, at least two other class feats from the oozemorph archetype

You can connect with oozes (and other amorphous aberrations, at the GM's discretion) on a rudimentary level. You can use Diplomacy to Make an Impression on oozes and to make very simple Requests of them. In most instances, oozes will give you time to make your case.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wUHnauB3atxO1RIo]{Rubbery Skin} 专长 10

先决条件 Disturbing Defense

Your skin develops a malleable, rubbery quality. You gain resistance to bludgeoning damage equal to 2 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype. You also gain resistance equal to twice that amount to extra damage from critical hits; if the resistance is greater than the extra damage, it reduces the extra damage to 0 but doesn't reduce the attack's normal damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MD33E76f2olLnDZb]{Uncanny Suction} 专长 12

先决条件 Oozemorph Dedication

Your limbs produce strange, sucker-like growths that allow you to adhere to walls, objects, and most other surfaces. You gain a climb Speed equal to your half your land Speed (minimum 5 feet). If you have the Quick Climb feat, your climb Speed is equal to your land Speed. In addition, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC to avoid being Disarmed.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.As8cRK5jVzf62fEd]{Peculiar Anatomy} 专长 14

先决条件 Disturbing Defense

Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against disease and poison, and resistance to poison damage equal to half your level.

In addition, your resistance to precision damage from Disturbing Defense increases to an amount equal to 7 + your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, and the DC of your flat checks to recover from persistent bleed damage is 8 rather than 13.

Oracle.name: 先知 Oracle
Oracle.description:
先知 Oracle

神秘力量赋予你神力和诅咒。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OUNj8nXTHwGcEdlh]{先知入门 Oracle Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 魅力14

选择一个@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.PRJYLksQEwT39bTl]{秘示域 Mystery}。你在宗教以及与秘示域相关的技能上受训；若你已经受训，则自行选择一个技能变为受训作为替代。你获得秘示域诅咒一栏内在第一段描述中最轻微、且常驻的效果，但你无法获得秘示域通常会提供的其他效果。你能像先知一般施法，并且会获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{施放法术 Cast a Spell}行动。你获得具有两个戏法的法术库，这可以是常见神术戏法，也可以是你领悟或学会的其他神术戏法。你在神术法术攻击骰和神术法术DC上的熟练度为受训。你在施放先知变体法术时的关键施法属性为魅力，且这些法术为神术先知法术。

特殊 直至选取另外两个先知变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NdgMxlz5I1ddT0Zi]{基础秘术 Basic Mysteries} 专长 4

先决条件 先知入门

你获得一个自选的1级或2级先知专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7ycF0fgSw1ovUPit]{基础先知施法 Basic Oracle Spellcasting} 专长 4

先决条件 先知入门

你获得基础施法能力。每当你通过先知变体而获得新环级的法术位时，将一个此环级的常见神术法术、或者你领悟或学会的其他神术法术加入你的法术库。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HdhnAm9SNfDqxRSN]{最初启示 First Revelation} 专长 4

先决条件 先知入门

你获得自身秘示域的初始启示法术。施放该法术会增强你的@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.ibX2EhKkyUtbOHLj]{先知诅咒 Oracular Curse}。使用你的秘示域的低阶诅咒，但是当你再次增强诅咒时，你不会获得中阶诅咒的效果，取而代之的是你会在低阶诅咒的效果之外额外陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态。

若你没有聚能池，那么你会获得具有1点聚能点的聚能池。你能够通过调和体内冲突的神力本质来进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}，而这也会降低你的诅咒程度。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PxTRE0mFEO3tyt8h]{进阶秘术 Advanced Mysteries} 专长 6

先决条件 基础秘术

你获得一个先知专长。在判断专长的先决条件时，你的先知等级等同于自身角色等级的一半。

特殊 你可以多次选取该专长。每次选取都会获得另一个先知专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y4Cws9vZj3Bf9uqH]{神力赐福 Mysterious Breadth} 专长 8

先决条件 基础先知施法

除了最高的两个环级之外，每个先知变体专长提供的法术环级均会增加一个法术位。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FtO8DjjMLBtWiRhZ]{专家先知施法 Expert Oracle Spellcasting} 专长 12

先决条件 基础先知施法, 宗教达到大师熟练度

你获得专家施法能力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZkGhDEpqe7fzJuSr]{大师先知施法 Master Oracle Spellcasting} 专长 18

先决条件 专家先知施法, 宗教达到传奇熟练度

你获得大师施法能力。

Overwatch.name: 守望哨卫 Overwatch
Overwatch.description:
守望哨卫 Overwatch

稀有度 罕见

你用坚实的思维和敏锐的目光观察着战场，就好像你和你的盟友都是棋盘上的棋子。依靠预测危险和危害，你向你的同伴提供见解，并通过敏锐观察和团队协作赢得战斗。每当出现威胁或缺口时，你将是第一个指出的，并且已经准备好在必要时给予直接的援助。

作为团队的守望，你可能因为这个职位而变得傲慢。在这种情况下，你可能会认为自己作为棋盘背后的操纵者，对于你的盟友是超然的；认为他们只不过是战场上的棋子。

但更有可能的是，你的角色使得你与你的盟友有着更深的联系，当你将独立的自我融入队伍，为团队的需求服务时，你的配合能力和英勇行径尤为突出。在这种情况下，你可能会把自己看作是一个有机整体的一部分——如果你的队伍是一个活的身体，那么你就仿佛眼睛一样，但这并不意味着你就是大脑、心脏或其他最重要的器官。每个人都扮演着一个至关重要的角色。

守望哨卫的训练 Overwatch Training

并非任何人都可以被训练成为他们队伍的守望哨卫。敏锐而深刻的察觉能力自然是必要的，但仅凭这一点并不够。尽管许多游侠或游荡者必须保持感官的敏锐，否则他们的职业生涯将极其短暂；但一个真正的守望哨卫还必须能够用从五感（以及他们可能拥有的任何其他特殊感官）获得的所有信息来做出瞬间的决定，来实现一个战术目标。这种反应力可以部分通过日常的若干小时训练得到——这些训练旨在帮助一个潜在的守望哨卫，将需要他们技能的真实威胁与状况和虚假的那些分开；而在他们不克制自己的情况下，那些虚假的状况甚至会导致真正的问题。然而，尽管训练有助于将良好的规程融入到一个人的条件反射和肌肉记忆中，但终究，一个天生缺乏良好战术本能的守望哨卫候选者会发现这些训练很难达成结果，或者甚至在最坏的情况下，不可能达成结果。

除了感官和本能，守望哨卫的角色还需要创新你的视觉增强设备的能力，来帮助消除失业盲区，以发现其他人错过了什么事物。这极其重要的，因为你必须用目光追踪你的团队和附近的敌人。虽然对你来说，足够的手艺技能来维护和升级你的视觉增强设备并不必须，但许多成功的守望哨卫选择了这样做，以期更好地理解每个部分是如何一起效力来创造一个整体的。

先决条件 察觉的熟练度为专家

你被一个@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺弥漫}的守望战场灵光包围。你的守望战场灵光提高了你的察觉能力，并允许你在灵光范围内向你的盟友发出警告以指出威胁。这种灵光具有听觉和视觉特征。当使用察觉以进行先攻检定时，你和你守望战场灵光内的盟友将获得+2环境加值。

Pactbound Initiate.name: Pactbound Initiate
Pactbound Initiate.description:
Pactbound Initiate

稀有度 稀有

Saumen kar can initiate a member of another ancestry into their pact, imbuing the creature with their power and their curse. Over time, this pact slowly changes the initiate internally and, sometimes, externally as well. The initiate's mind slowly fills with ancient pieces of lore and techniques that are as much part of the saumen kar as their hands and feet. As the initiate's mind adapts to this knowledge and power, their body sometimes evolves in kind—sprouting sweeping horns, gaining heightened olfactory senses, and growing additional height and muscle—becoming a hybrid between their old ancestry and saumen kar, wrapped in runic tattoos.

An unwilling creature can never be forced to become a pactbound initiate, and only those with deep bonds of mutual friendship with a saumen kar can even attempt the process. Befriending a saumen kar can be enough to begin one's initiation into the pact, though they must choose to accept the burden and can change their minds about undertaking the pact at any point until their final transition (represented by the Bound in Ice feat). Once a creature has completed the pact by accepting the full burden of a saumen kar and taking the Bound in Ice feat, all transformations are permanent. At that point, they can't retrain the Pactbound Dedication, Frostbite Runes, or Bound in Ice feats and must live out the rest of their lives as something between their old ancestry and a saumen kar. If their normal lifespan was less than 400 years, it's increased to at least 400 years. If their natural lifespan was greater than 400 years, it's instead reduced to approximately that amount of time.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BVxcuJ5TWfN1px4L]{Pactbound Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 Erutaki or Jotun language, trained in Nature, must have earned the trust of a saumen kar who initiates you into the archetype

You befriended one of the last saumen kar and were infused with a fraction of their power, granting you the potential to become a guardian of their ancient pact. You gain cold resistance equal to half your level. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} while it's snowing even lightly, even if it wouldn't be thick enough to normally grant concealment. Finally, all saumen kar can sense the mark of their pact upon you, and their attitude toward you is typically one step better than it would be otherwise (hostile to unfriendly, unfriendly to indifferent, etc.) Most saumen kar are unfriendly to outsiders; this would make them indifferent to you.

特殊 You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the pactbound initiate变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0evTnx67DYsxWtg3]{Ice Crafter} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BVxcuJ5TWfN1px4L]{Pactbound Dedication}

The ancient ice-crafting techniques of the saumen kar awaken within you. You become trained in Crafting, or become an expert if you were already trained. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xWY5omyIcILNR7y1]{Magical Crafting} skill feat. You can craft permanent items out of ice instead of metal or wood; these items are a translucent crystal-blue in color, resemble icicles and glacier ice, and have the same statistics and properties as cold iron, including the price and the ability to deal additional damage to certain kinds of creatures. Any creature who wields or wears a piece of ice-crafted equipment takes 1 cold damage each round from contact with the primal cold of the crafted ice.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.00uTUJPgJ6kuGR8O]{Crown of the Saumen Kar} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BVxcuJ5TWfN1px4L]{Pactbound Dedication}

Your body begins to evolve and adapt, taking the first steps towards blending your very self with the ancient curse of the saumen kar. You become larger and bulkier, pushing the very edge of height and weight for your size. You gain scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet and gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks made to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} in areas of forest and snow. You sprout a pair of horns from your forehead, gaining a horns unarmed attack that deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage. Your horns are in the brawling group and have the shove and trip traits.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gipC9eWrBDFRpNkQ]{Frostbite Runes} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BVxcuJ5TWfN1px4L]{Pactbound Dedication}

Thick tattoos, each one a rune fragment from the saumen kar's long-lost language spelling out their pact with their equally lost deity, cover your body and stretch across your limbs, torso, and face. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against evil and necromancy spells and effects. You can sense the presence of evil undead as a pervasive taste of oily corruption in the air; this is a vague sense that allows you to know when such a creature is within 60 feet of you, though you can't precisely pinpoint their location with this sense. As normal for a vague sense, it can be fooled, but undead might not realize they need to take precautions against it. This sense also extends to living creatures who have the negative healing ability, like dhampir.

You deal an additional 1 cold damage with all Strikes made with an ice-crafted weapon. If you have the Crown of the Saumen Kar feat, you deal an additional 1 cold damage with your unarmed horns Strikes.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UJcuACMlspc1raL1]{Curse of the Saumen Kar} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gipC9eWrBDFRpNkQ]{Frostbite Runes}

Frequency once per day

You activate the runes on your body to create an icy prison around a Huge or smaller creature you can see within 60 feet. The prison is a sphere made of unmelting ice, just large enough to fit your target. The target, and any creatures sharing its space, must attempt a Reflex save, with a DC using the higher of your class DC and spell DC. A creature that fails becomes trapped inside the prison. If it succeeds, the creature is pushed outside the prison into a space of its choice. If the target shares its space with a gargantuan creature, the effect fails.

The dome has AC 10, Hardness 20, and 40 Hit Points; it's immune to cold, critical hits, and precision damage. The prison lasts until destroyed, until you use this ability to create a new prison, or until you die.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MGtlUc6cy4nCM4Lk]{Bound in Ice} 专长 16

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gipC9eWrBDFRpNkQ]{Frostbite Runes}

You become a hybrid of your ancestry and a saumen kar. Your size increases to Large, and your reach becomes 10 feet. Your cold resistance increases to be equal to your level, and you gain fire resistance equal to half your level.

You also gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.a47Npi5XHXo47y49]{Blizzard Evasion} reaction.

Pathfinder Agent.name: Pathfinder Agent
Pathfinder Agent.description:
Pathfinder Agent

You're a field agent of the globe-trotting Pathfinder Society, sworn to report, explore, and cooperate. You explore the world, gathering artifacts and antiquities, and record your adventures for posterity.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QnB5ArlO4wlRXQ2E]{Pathfinder Agent Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 member of the Pathfinder Society

获取许可 You are from Absalom.

Your Pathfinder training has broadened your horizons and made you more flexible at various skills, since you never know when you might need an obscure skill to complete your mission. You become trained in one skill of your choice, or expert in a skill of your choice in which you were trained. You also become trained in Pathfinder Lore, or an expert if you were already trained. When using a skill untrained, your proficiency bonus is equal to your level instead of 0. You gain access to wayfinders.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Pathfinder Agent变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qQh8wnslOagixxD1]{Careful Explorer} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You've explored enough dusty tombs and hidden vaults to gain a sixth sense about traps, and you sometimes notice them even when you're not trying to. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you get a check to find traps that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the trap.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.68Kc4UyhnP4l8mxq]{Dead Reckoning} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, trained in Survival

You've trained yourself to maintain a strong sense of direction at all times, even when you can't use a compass or see the sky above. You immediately intuit which direction is north (assuming the concept of north exists at your current location).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8pmd9gMl3TamFx3u]{Deft Cooperation} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

When you set things up to help your allies, you also gain some of the fruits of your labors. When you successfully Aid an attack roll or AC, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls or AC against that enemy until the end of your next turn, whichever you granted to your ally. When you successfully Aid a skill check, if you attempt the exact same skill check (not just using the same skill, but using it for the same purpose, for instance a check to Climb the same wall) on your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your skill check.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vbHF6HEC9jQorFGl]{Environmental Explorer} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You've traversed enough untamed wilderness to gain an intuitive understanding of the dangers that exist in such places. Your extensive familiarity means you sometimes notice perils even when you're not trying to. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you can attempt a check to find environmental hazards that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find a particular hazard.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3QLWe5oS9jGJ0Oq4]{Observant Explorer} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

Thanks to the time you've spent wandering through wild and untamed environments, you've gained an intuitive sense about creatures. You sometimes notice them before they attack, or spot them nearby even if they weren't planning on attacking. You can attempt a check to notice hidden creatures attempting to Avoid Notice nearby even if you aren't actively Searching for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to notice a particular creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YhclkX1nfyUU8RtO]{Remember Your Training} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

Frequency once per day

During your training to become a Pathfinder Agent you were schooled on a wide variety of creatures you might encounter, and you can think back to that training to gain crucial insight in times of need. Attempt a check to Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, adding your level as a proficiency bonus if you are untrained (rather than 0). If you roll a failure (but not a critical failure) on this check, you get a success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pfBVx5xBfwKd1iVL]{Spiritual Explorer} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You're familiar with the danger that lingering spirits can pose to an unwary adventurer, and you're particularly attuned to their presence. Even if you aren't Searching in exploration mode, you can attempt a check to find haunts that normally require you to Search for them. You still need to meet any other requirements to find a particular haunt.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Thorough Reports} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

Your reports are thorough and informative, and putting your thoughts to paper helps you retain the information. Keep track of each type of creature you successfully identify with Recall Knowledge. When attempting Recall Knowledge checks against creatures on your list in later encounters, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and you learn an additional fact about such creatures on a success.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nU8W1QoA9hl3h6nR]{Watch and Learn} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

触发 An ally you can see succeeds or critically succeeds at a Strength- or Dexterity-based skill check, using a skill in which you are untrained.

Pathfinder agents serve as members of diverse teams with complementary skill sets. You are practiced at following the example of a more skilled ally to accomplish a wide variety of tasks. For the next minute you can add your level as a proficiency bonus to the observed skill check, even though you are untrained. This does not allow you to attempt trained actions using that skill unless you would otherwise be able to do so.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UyMQ1X8KLSZvm7AT]{Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer} 专长 4

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You can use the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to grant it additional effects. Choose one cantrip from the arcane, divine, occult, or primal list. You can activate your wayfinder to cast that cantrip at will. Additionally, you can Activate your wayfinder with a Single Action (envision) activation to transform it into a nondescript pin or brooch to hide your affiliation with the Pathfinder Society. This transformation lasts for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7O0PrMoXd5L8dRfg]{Archaeologist's Warning} 专长 6

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

触发 You are about to roll a Perception, Society, or Thievery check for initiative.

You visually or audibly warn your companions of danger, granting them a +1 circumstance bonus to their initiative rolls. Depending on whether you use gestures or call out, this free action gains either the visual or auditory trait.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xLD9EmkEmT8hgwv7]{Craft Facsimile} 专长 6

先决条件 expert in Crafting, Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You're renowned for your ability to recover important items, whether they're from a long-abandoned temple or a thieves' den, and sometimes that requires creating a stand-in. You can spend 1 minute to assemble a facsimile of an object of no more than 1 Bulk that you can see from available materials. The facsimile has the same shape and Bulk as the replaced object and can pass as the object if not examined. A creature familiar with the original who examines the object automatically realizes that it is a fake. A creature not familiar with the original can still tell it was a hastily jury-rigged stand-in of some kind, but they might not know the object was supposed to be something else.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OjvE7gaQgWiBqOhY]{Discerning Strike} 专长 6

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, Thorough Reports

需求 You have successfully identified the target with Recall Knowledge during this combat.

Identifying a creature is the first step in finding its weaknesses. Attempt a Strike against the target; if successful, you deal an additional 1d6 precision damage. If you have succeeded on a Recall Knowledge check against the target during this combat and their creature type was previously recorded using Thorough Reports, you also deal [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}. The creature is then temporarily immune to Discerning Strike for 1 day.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uwJQUFLymAWtJu1a]{Forced Entry} 专长 6

先决条件 expert in Athletics, Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You are trained to preserve the archaeological value of your location when entering. You don't take a penalty to Force Open doors, windows, or containers without a crowbar. If you roll a success on a check to Force Open, you get a critical success instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pkH4DPmMWcimMov7]{Westyr's Wayfinder Repository} 专长 6

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer

需求 You have at least one 1st-level spell slot and a wayfinder.

You can use your wayfinder to store a little extra magic for when you need it most. When making your daily preparations, you can choose one 1st-level spell from your spellbook or spell repertoire and store it in your wayfinder. You can cast this spell from the wayfinder using the normal actions required. Once the spell has been cast, it is expended, and you must make your next daily preparations to store another spell in your wayfinder.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yoeMOIgH8Snw1JCQ]{Diverse Recognition} 专长 8

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, master in a skill used to Recall Knowledge

Frequency once per round

触发 You successfully Recall Knowledge about a creature you can see, using a skill in which you are a master.

Your Pathfinder training allows you to quickly size up numerous threats. Attempt to Recall Knowledge against a different kind of creature you can see using the same skill. You must still meet the requirements to attempt this check.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5vRXZcGAbqKRoaqL]{Recognize Threat} 专长 8

先决条件 master in a Recall Knowledge skill, Pathfinder Agent Dedication

需求 You have master proficiency in a skill to identify the triggering creature.

触发 Your first turn of an encounter begins, and you can see a creature.

You quickly assess the threat so you can relay the information to your team. Attempt a Recall Knowledge check against the triggering creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.n3vpCWPjXAInRTyR]{Snap Out Of It!} 专长 8

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, master in Medicine

Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses. Attempt a Medicine check on an adjacent ally who is fascinated, frightened, stunned, or stupefied and choose one of those conditions. The DC is the DC for the effect that caused the condition.

大成功 Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 2. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.

成功 Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.

Failure The target is unaffected.

Critical Failure You increase the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, increase the duration by 1 round instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.o98nJriWE95xgweg]{Wayfinder Resonance Infiltrator} 专长 8

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication, Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer

You are adept at using the unusual resonance of your wayfinder to aid in any deceptions you might employ. Once per day you can activate your wayfinder to cast illusory disguise, heightened to 2nd level, as an arcane spell. Additionally, once per day, you can Activate your wayfinder with a single-action envision activation to transform it into a perfect replica of another similarly sized badge of membership or office, such as an Aspis Consortium badge. This transformation lasts for 1 hour.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.JwosaDYoqfPiFMYa]{Eidetic Memorization} 专长 10

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

Pathfinders are often asked to study the intricacies of ancient history under less than ideal conditions, and you've trained your brain to make the most of your limited time. You quickly memorize an inscription, scroll, or other piece of writing you can clearly see whose length is equivalent to no more than one page. You can then accurately recreate this writing using a writing kit, wax tablet, or other writing medium, once you have reached safety. You don't need to understand the writing or identify the language to reproduce it. Your memory lasts until the next time you make your daily preparations; if you have not written down or otherwise recreated what you saw by this point, your memory fades and any attempt to recreate what you saw is garbled and unintelligible. You can have only one piece of writing memorized at a time; any previous memorization fades the next time you use this ability.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.amf2zZuW299eiHAZ]{Everyone Duck!} 专长 10

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

触发 You fail, but don't critically fail, an attempt to Disable a Device on a trap.

You intentionally set off the trap, but you take special precautions to protect yourself and your allies from the trap's effects. For the next 2 rounds, if the trap rolls a critical success on an attack roll, it gets a normal success instead, and if anyone rolls a critical failure on their saving throw against the trap, they get a normal failure instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a2Owk9WI4pjSPuHf]{Educated Assessment} 专长 12

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

You attempt to Recall Knowledge about a creature, and the GM uses the same secret roll result against the creature's Deception or Stealth DC, giving you the information from a Battle Assessment. You might get a different degree of success on the Recall Knowledge check than what you get for the Battle Assessment. If you have the Battle Assessment feat, you gain the effects of Educated Assessment whenever you Recall Knowledge (such as with the Automatic Knowledge feat).

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xNejAvuRXKYq2D6A]{Swap Investment} 专长 12

先决条件 Pathfinder Agent Dedication

Frequency once per day

Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field. You Invest a magic item and remove a previously invested item. The previous item no longer counts against your limit of 10 invested items.

Pirate.name: 海贼 Pirate
Pirate.description:
海贼 Pirate

你过着自由的生活，用武力与威吓夺取一切你想要的东西。你可能是一名私掠者，为了某个国家或其他权威当局抢劫和掠夺；你也可以只对自己那反复无常的念头负责而不顾他人死活。不管怎样，你靠着恐吓、智慧和战斗能力从那些你认为不配拥有财富的人身上进行掠夺。

海贼在浪客中尤为常见，许多海贼也具有浪客职业或其变体。与浪客的华丽行为类似，经典的海贼战术通常为刻意炫技，并以此来留下印象、威吓和获取派头。举例说明，若你具有派头职业特性，而你在登船袭击的特技检定中超过了对于你等级来说的极难DC时，你就会获得派头。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.l1eCHNahsBb7rUkT]{海贼入门 Pirate Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 威吓达到受训熟练度

作为一名海贼，你会为了搜寻可以掠夺的敌舰而在海上航行。你的航海学识（Sailing Lore）熟练度变为受训，若你在该技能上的熟练度已经为受训，则变为专家作为替代。

你忽略由于船只移动而导致的困难地形或高低不平的地面的效果。此外，你获得了@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.vZltxwRNvF5khf9a]{登船袭击 Boarding Assault}动作。

特殊 直至选取另外两个海贼变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i86JRWsFRpfEJnZP]{海贼武器训练 Pirate Weapon Training} 专长 4

先决条件 海贼入门

你擅长使用传统的海贼武器。你在后述武器的熟练度变为受训：@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{短柄斧 Hatchet}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.tH5GirEy7YB3ZgCk]{细剑 Rapier}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.grmaV4GdoGD7sKbn]{弯刀 Scimitar}和@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.f1gwoTkf3Nn0v3PN]{鞭子 Whip}。

每当你通过职业特性使得上述某个或几个武器的熟练度等级提升至专家或更高时，你的上述所有武器的熟练度等级均会得到提升。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wpqKltAoJjRQgWow]{攀绳能手 Rope Runner} 专长 4

先决条件 特技和运动达到受训熟练度，海贼入门

你在绳索和索具上攀爬和奔跑就和在地面上活动一样轻松。你获得15尺@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pprgrYQ1QnIDGZiy]{攀爬 Climb} 速度，但是仅限于在船只的索具或类似绳索上时。

每当你在攀爬绳索的运动检定或在绳索上@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{保持平衡 Balance}的特技检定中成功时，你会获得大成功作为替代。你不会因为攀爬绳索或在绳索上维持平衡而陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TzBP8yiZQHNhei1V]{走跳板 Walk The Plank} 专长 8

先决条件 海贼入门

你恐吓敌人走到你希望他所踏上的位置，在传统上是让敌人走跳板。对1名敌人尝试@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize}；此次检定获得失能特征。

成功时，除了正常效果之外，你还能迫使目标行走，移动至多等同于其速度的距离。由你选择目标要走的路径，且这被视为是你的走跳板（Walk The Plank）动作的一部分。除非你的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} 检定结果为大成功，否则你无法迫使目标移动进入有害空间（会让目标受到伤害、坠落、引发反应动作或类似的空间）。

目标会在24小时内临时免疫你的走跳板。

Pistol Phenom.name: 短枪怪杰 Pistol Phenom
Pistol Phenom.description:
短枪怪杰 Pistol Phenom

稀有度 罕见

“你看到我能做到这的，当我说我不会失误时，你应该知道我说的是实话。那只是一个警告。现在，如果你能好心地把保险箱里的东西倒进我的袋子里，我看这件事没什么必要变得不愉快……的吧?”
——一名挥舞着手枪的不明半精灵亡命之徒，在计划用资金来贿赂法官的腐败阿肯斯塔盾勋执法官前说的话。

你将战斗当作一种艺术，而你的手枪则是你表演的延伸。你或许持有一把或一对手枪，也可能一手持剑一手持枪以达成花里胡哨的动作。然而，无论你怎样，手枪或其他单手武器的使用对你的技术和风格至关重要。

对你来说，一切都是为表演，你使用枪作为道具，不仅是为了杀死对手，还是为了欺骗、误导、阻碍甚至胁迫他们做你想让他们做的事。当其他人倾向于把注意力集中在尽可能多的破坏时，你的风格却是有关于操控的。通过控制敌人的注意力和行动，你可以增强自己的攻击并减少敌人造成伤害的可能性。你可以像控制舞台表演一样控制战斗的节奏，小心地确保敌人的行动不会超出你的预计中。你既是这部剧的导演又是主角，而你的敌人会随着你手枪演奏的旋律起舞……有时真的能做到这个!

如何成为一名怪杰？ What Makes a Phenom?

许多枪手学习如何转动手枪或恐吓敌人，但使你成为怪杰不仅仅是因为你的技能，还有你的风格和态度。作为一名短枪怪杰，你知道如何用你做的每件事来吸引所有人的注意力，尤其是你说话的方式，走路的方式，以及你用枪的方式。但更重要的是，你相当了解这个事实和你对别人的影响力，以及你不怕出名。

尽管你有这样的态度，但作为一名短枪怪杰，你很有可能会与一群盟友相处得很好，了解如何利用聚光灯保护你的盟友，以及如何分享聚光灯以确保他们获得曝光的机会。唯一的例外可能是其他的短枪怪杰。当两个或更多的短枪怪杰聚集在同一队伍时，几乎不可避免地会出现决斗或是其他竞争。然而，这样的竞争不一定会以相互敌对告终。根据你和另一名短枪怪杰的气质，在比赛中表现出来的竞争结果而可能会成为一生的挚友，尽管你们都在记录自己最大的成就来比较功绩。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 至少在一件单手火器上受训，在欺骗和表演技能上受训

你旋转武器，让对手猝不及防。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.A2EBy2L4acrehiAA]{手枪花招 Pistol Twirl}枪客专长以允许你对一名处于第一射程增量范围内的敌人使用虚招。该手枪花招专长如同正常情况下满足所有需要该专长的先决条件，但该专长不能被视为短枪怪杰变体专长以满足选择其他变体入门要求或被计算为短枪怪杰变体专长数量中。当你使用单手火器进行虚招时，你可以选择表演技能检定来替代欺骗技能检定。

特殊 在你从短枪怪杰变体获得两个其他专长之前，你不能选择其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FbzbZc4LGUTcz9tA]{枪火挑战 Gunpowder Gauntlet} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

需求 你持有一把已装填的单手火器。

你的花招维持着敌人的注意力，枪支的摆动迫使他们和你进行一场死亡游戏。当你玩弄他们及你的火器时，他们狭窄的视野被你放大，让他们陷入你制造的感知陷阱中。对处于你所持单手火器第一射程增量范围之内的目标尝试一个表演技能检定来对抗目标的意志豁免DC。

大成功 直至你的下回合开始时，目标的攻击骰获得-2状态减值。

成功 直至你的下回合开始时，目标的攻击骰获得-1状态减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8x3wqCZgYzJiSyR1]{枪弹炫击 Dazzling Bullet} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

你的把戏让对手不知所措，让枪弹出现在其视野中以反射光线直射其眼部(或其他视觉器官)。尝试一个表演技能检定来对抗目标的意志豁免DC，并对该目标进行远程火器打击。如果打击成功对目标生物造成伤害，同时表演检定成功的话，该生物将@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dtPXuS8MiWrz5UNK]{跳跃反射 Hot Foot} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

需求 你持有一把已装填的单手火器。

通过仔细瞄准，你让一个生物“起舞”。你朝目标脚边的地面射击，让他们做出不自主的反应;即使是具有无心智特征的生物也会有下意识的反应来躲避攻击，而你可以利用这些无法控制的反应来达到你的目标。当他们随着你短枪射击的悦耳曲调起舞时，你就能确保你的敌人无法准备为你和盟友提供一些“惊喜” 。对处于你所持单手火器第一射程增量范围之内的目标尝试一个攻击检定来对抗目标的反射豁免DC。

大成功 直到你的下回合开始前，目标无法使用反应动作，同时获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}状态以及在反射豁免获得-2环境减值。

成功 直到你的下回合开始前，目标无法使用反应动作。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4YqmeJQwnrG1Lg07]{怪杰狂热 Phenom's Verve} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

你拥有一种惊人的活力，它不仅将你与普通的枪支使用者区分，甚至还将你与其他怪杰区分开。当你完美地表演并用你的能力控制场面时，这种神奇的活力使对手陷入灾难当中，并确保他们留在你的视线中，以便你对他们进行后续攻击。如果你在“手枪花招”或“短枪怪杰变体专长”的表演检定中大成功时，直到你的回合结束时，你的单手火器及单手近战武器攻击骰获得+1状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ssrublnppwFSvVcb]{「举起手来！」 Reach for the Sky} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

需求 你持有一把已装填的单手火器。

你向天鸣枪并命令在场的所有人高举双手投降。尝试一次威吓检定以对30尺内的所有敌人执行一次挫败士气，因此行动而陷入惊惧的生物会高举双手。如果其正举起盾牌，那他就会失去这项好处，这是因为盾牌也被举起到无助于格挡攻击的位置上。所有因陷入惊惧而举起双手的生物都无法执行任何需要使用他们的手或手上所持物品才能启动的反应及自由动作，这项效果持续到他们下一回合开始时。无论结果如何， 受影响的生物会在接下来的1分钟内免疫「举起手来！」行动。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dloGUhZYG1xUPVE4]{飘逸击落 Whirling Knockdown} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PFMsj4LtdAIuGn4R]{短枪怪杰入门 Pistol Phenom Dedication}

需求 你同时持有一把已装填的单手火器和一把单手近战武器。

对处于近战触及范围内的生物进行一次远程火器打击，随后进行一个表演技能检定来对抗目标的反射豁免DC。如果打击大成功，则这次的目标反射豁免DC获得-2环境惩罚。表演技能检定的结果如下：

大成功 目标进入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}状态，同时从坠落中受到[[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害}。

成功 目标进入倒地状态。

大失败 你的计划出现了点意外，你所持的近战武器掉落在你所处的方格中。

Poisoner.name: 投毒者 Poisoner
Poisoner.description:
投毒者 Poisoner

人类在自然界中是如此地脆弱。蛇咬一口，血凝成冻。磨石成粉，便能致幻。树木汁液引起的疼痛能让人生不如死。作为此种黑暗奇观的研习者，你的危险性不言自明。

补充专长：4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0lieFKdwgNVXep7u]{毒素抗力 Poison Resistance}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QZ00D2xdJnbWFzml]{精准传递 Subtle Delivery}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ALbosSUygdq4T1Yk]{涂毒武器 Poison Weapon}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FdP21jbjHHGpHut1]{顽强毒素 Tenacious Toxins}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.b7isszc8C75V3okn]{黏着毒药 Sticky Poison}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9Eufa07qvXG41QmG]{精通涂毒武器 Improved Poison Weapon}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XtIPmZ3Ihq5NJHP2]{狡诈毒师 Pinpoint Poisoner}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AYXherMu9gFTyXjp]{精通涂毒武器 Deadly Poison Weapon}; 18级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IA8p9oYmsCbipmhw]{化学传播 Chemical Contagion}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.y7DDs03GtDnmhxFp]{投毒者入门 Poisoner Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 手艺达到受训熟练度

你的手边总是会准备着一点毒药——你永远不知道砒霜或者类似的道具能在何时变得有用。你获得基础炼金术能力的好处，不过你只能用它制作炼金毒素。

你每日能获得等同于自身等级的灌注试剂。你制作这些物品的高阶炼金术（Advanced Alchemy）等级为1，且不会自行增加。

特殊 直至选取另外两个投毒者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pKoW1X95LjmWn5Jq]{攻其毒疮 Poisoner's Twist} 专长 4

先决条件 投毒者入门, 医疗达到受训熟练度

需求 你的上个动作是一次成功的近战打击，造成伤害的目标正被毒素所影响，且你知道他中的是何种毒素

毒素能攻击身体的特定部位——一种毒素以肺部为目标，另一种攻击血液循环，还有一种在损伤神经。你知晓任何利用这些弱点。

你对目标造成[[/r {1d6}]]{1d6点伤害} ，伤害类型与要求中的打击相同，外加[[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6点毒素伤害} 。若你至少达到了18级，则上述每种伤害均变为[[/r 2d6]]{2d6点}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VruIzuysxw4tY6rk]{投毒专家 Expert Poisoner} 专长 6

先决条件 投毒者入门, 手艺达到专家熟练度

你在制作毒素时，@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Pe0zmIqyTBc2Td0I]{高阶炼金术 Advanced Alchemy}等级为你的等级 - 3。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eHkMcQQ4ejRAFJAt]{淬毒外衣 Poison Coat} 专长 6

先决条件 投毒者入门

触发 1名与你相邻的生物使用一次近战非武装打击命中你

需求 你在服装里已经做好毒害攻击者的准备（见后文）

在自然界中，有的动物身上布满了带毒的尖刺，因此即便只是碰触这些动物都是足以致命的行为。

要使用这个反应动作，你必须将毒素刷到衣服上，或者将淬毒的针编到服装的布料上。进行这项准备会花费10分钟并消耗一剂接触或伤口毒素。同一时间你只能让一种此类毒素施加到衣服上。

当你使用了这个反应动作后，触发动作的生物便会暴露在你所施加的毒素中。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nx2nB10rypAuspAa]{后天耐毒性 Acquired Tolerance} 专长 8

先决条件 投毒者入门

触发 你在对抗毒素的豁免中失败

你以非致命的剂量服用少量毒素，久而久之便让身体建立起足矣对抗致命剂量的抵抗力。重掷触发反应动作的检定并使用第二次结果。

一旦你使用后天耐毒性，你就能在当日继续使用它对抗同类毒素，但直至你下次进行每日准备为止，都无法用它对抗不同种类的毒素。

举例说明，若你在对抗@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.QGXNqpP5KvSldoZz]{巨蝎毒 Giant Scorpion Venom}时使用反应动作，那么即便来源不同，你也仍旧可以使用它来对抗巨蝎毒；但你无法再用它来对抗@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.KdeeRCrtsDCJLfgc]{荨麻草渣 Nettleweed Residue}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.ca2lzxfJxvuLDrKu]{巫妖尘 Lich Dust}或其他毒素。

Provocator.name: Provocator
Provocator.description:
Provocator

The provocator is a gladiator who mixes brilliant performance with mastery of weapons.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.VJ3wIsfmabK02SNg]{Provocator Dedication} 专长 10

先决条件 力量 14, 魅力 14

获取许可 Successfully defeat the eberarks in the Irorium.

For you, fighting is as much about style as skill. You become trained in simple weapons, martial weapons, and one advanced weapon of your choice. When you critically succeed at an attack roll using your chosen advanced weapon, you also apply the critical specialization of that weapon. You become an expert in Performance and your choice of either Acrobatics or Athletics. If you were an expert in all three of these skills, you instead become an expert in a skill of your choice.

特殊 直至选取另外两个provocator变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lmAuoHPxzQdaSUmN]{Cartwheel Dodge} 专长 12

先决条件 Provocator Dedication

需求 You aren't encumbered or overburdened.

触发 You succeed or critically succeed at a Reflex saving throw.

You Step up to 10 feet.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.isdTXU8bV7ZVOAuQ]{Flourishing Finish} 专长 12

先决条件 Provocator Dedication

需求 Your last action was a Strike that dropped an opponent to 0 Hit Points.

Attempt a Performance check, comparing the result to the Will DC of each foe within 30 feet who can see you. Regardless of the result, each target is immune to your Flourishing Finish for 10 minutes.

大成功 The target is Frightened 2.

成功 The target is frightened 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IdKfWg48qMieuzl7]{Murderer's Circle} 专长 14

Provocator Dedication

You Strike a target within reach and then Step to any other open space adjacent to that target. Your target is then flat-footed against your next Strike this turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZTxiM8NExDmxHJDf]{Pin to the Spot} 专长 14

先决条件 Provocator Dedication

You Strike a target within reach. If you hit and deal damage, the target is also Restrained as if you had critically succeeded at an Athletics check to Grapple.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.giupBd3dyOwdeoFl]{Performance Weapon Expert} 专长 16

先决条件 Provocator Dedication, expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack

Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons. Your proficiency ranks for simple weapons and martial weapons increase to expert, as does your proficiency rank for your chosen advanced weapon.

Reanimator.name: 赋生者 Reanimator
Reanimator.description:
赋生者 Reanimator

大多数文化都崇敬死者的尸体，他们按照几代人形成的传统，安放凡人的遗体。这种习俗假定只要居住于躯体之中的灵魂去往骨园，剩下的空壳除了回归为组成它的元素，就再没有其它意义。而你所了解的情况并非如此。尸体作为曾经容纳不朽灵魂的容器，拥有巨大的力量和潜力，是创造出无与伦比奇迹的完美建材。作为赋生者，你选择专注研究死灵术的一部分，将死人的肉体转化为无数种类的亡灵，从最低级的摇晃尸体和易碎骨架，到只有最狂热或者说最出色的凡人头脑，才能想出的恐怖壮丽的憎恶。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xSYkYRKlSyLzPrH1]{不灭信念 Undying Conviction}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PxBQ4JdaPS2KTAG7]{死灵师面容 Necromancer's Visage}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wnrlBkwVr8BSVAZt]{幽冥超度 Sepulchral Sublimation}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5Cm2TYHzoO2DbQNM]{赋生者入门 Reanimator Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 能够用法术位释放操控死尸

你专注研究活化和指挥不死生物的艺术。如果你是自发施法者且法术库里有@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{操控死尸 Animate Dead}，那么除了你本身通常所具有的标志性法术以外，操控死尸也成为你的标志性法术。如果你是准备施法者，在你的已知法术、法术书或类似东西中有操控死尸，你可以花10分钟来思考不死生物，把一个你已在法术位中准备的法术替换成一个同等级的操控死尸法术。此外，如果你在释放操控死尸时，作为法术目标的死亡生物如果类型合适且遗体大部分完整，那么你活化的不死生物于操控死尸的持续时间内，在攻击检定、AC、豁免和技能检定上获得+1状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feat-effects.EQCnu8DGHDDNXch0]{效果: 赋生者入门}

特殊 直到你选取赋生者变体的两个其它专长以前，你无法选择其它入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PjsIiVM7yI0XgaFi]{死亡之秘 Deathly Secrets} 专长 6

先决条件 赋生者入门

没有制造和指挥不死生物的方法是你无法掌握的，即使是那些不属于你魔法根源的方法。你可以学习@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DLFupJuCfzyLCQcO]{死者之眼 Eyes of the Dead}或@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Cd6Crl4wpQaMSYrF]{控制亡灵 Subjugate Undead}聚能法术。如果你还没有聚能池，你获得含有1点聚能点的聚能池，你可以通过在有知觉生物的遗体上冥想进行再聚能动作。赋生者变体所赋予的聚能法术与你用以满足先决条件的属于同一根源。

特殊 你可以多次选择此专长。每次选择，你习得不同的法术，并且聚能点增加1。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.reoylyGMDPl7H6L5]{死之专家 Macabre Virtuoso} 专长 6

先决条件 赋生者入门; 奥法、神秘或宗教达到专家熟练

任何死灵法师都会创造僵尸和骷髅，但你知道创造更高级亡灵怪物背后的秘密。你习得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.c3b6LdLlQDPngNIb]{唤起死灵 Create Undead}仪式，用来创造两种类型你符合先决条件的常见亡灵（你的GM可以给你其它类型亡灵的许可）。你不能把这些仪式教给其他人，你也不能在允许其他人作为主要施法者的情况下参与这两种仪式，除非他们也知道这个仪式。当你升级时，你可以将一个或两个亡灵仪式改成你现在满足先决条件的亡灵类型的仪式。

当你作为主要施法者时，你可以在4小时内完成所有唤起死灵仪式，取代原来的1天，并且你的主要检定获得+2的环境加值。你还可以在没有次要施法者的辅助下完成仪式，在这种情况下，你尝试次要检定。

特殊 你可以多次选择此专长。每次选择，你可以再学习两种制造亡灵生物的仪式。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8cq6NO087Te3P9yw]{死亡链接 Bonds of Death} 专长 8

先决条件 赋生者入门

频率 每天一次

需求 你本回合释放了@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9WGeBwIIbbUuWKq0]{操控死尸 Animate Dead}

你随着操控死尸的法术动作摇晃，引导你的力量同时维持两个。你维持先前释放的操控死尸，用形而上学的绳索将两个法术的死灵能量链接到一起。在接下来的每轮，你可以用单动作同时维持两个操控死尸。这个好处一直持续到其中一个法术结束。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QHh442n2CEtJr23B]{高等死亡之秘 Greater Deathly Secrets} 专长 10

先决条件 死亡之秘

你的不死之秘越发强大。你习得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qzsQmpiQodHBBWYI]{恶灵再生 Malignant Sustenance}或@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2YIr0S2Gt14PMMQp]{墓土之握 Grasping Grave}聚能法术。你的聚能点增加1。

特殊 你可以多次选择此专长。每次选择，你学习不同的法术，并且聚能点增加1。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.178rqdgJBF9Rl0Gi]{亡灵之主 Master of the Dead} 专长 12

先决条件 死亡之秘

你已经达到了赋生者技艺的顶峰：有能力将几乎所有的尸体或骨架复活为对生物曾经存在的可怕嘲讽。你学会了@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Z82DvtSXafPmh4KV]{蹒跚怖物 Shambling Horror}聚能法术。你的聚能点加1。

Red Mantis Assassin.name: Red Mantis Assassin
Red Mantis Assassin.description:
Red Mantis Assassin

You are a Red Mantis assassin, inducted by the mantis god and sworn to chase your prey to the end of the world and beyond.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UuPZ7drPBnSmI8Eo]{Red Mantis Assassin Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in sawtooth sabers, deity is Achaekek, lawful evil alignment, member of the Red Mantis assassins

获取许可 You are from Mediogalti Island.

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth sabre. You become trained in Stealth and Assassin Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency wi级@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.wkzxLpSe7LN6c5Ld]{Sawtooth Saber}.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Red Mantis assassin变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6RjilN93bgy34y3H]{Basic Red Mantis Magic} 专长 4

先决条件 trained in Religion, Red Mantis Assassin Dedication

You have learned limited divine magic from your Red Mantis training. You gain the Cast a Spell activity. You're a prepared spellcaster, able to prepare two cantrips and one 1st-level spell each day. You prepare these spells from a Red Mantis assassin spellbook, similar to a wizard's, containing three cantrips and two 1st-level spells. All the spells in your Red Mantis assassin spellbook, from this and later feats, must be either transmutation or illusion spells from the arcane spell list or a spell from the following list: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HXhWYJviWalN5tQ2]{Clairaudience}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zvKWclOZ7A53DObE]{Clairvoyance}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{Dimension Door}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FhOaQDTSnsY7tiam]{Modify Memory}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.DCQHaLrYXMI37dvW]{Paralyze}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{True Strike}. Regardless of their usual magical tradition, your Red Mantis assassin spells are divine spells, as are any Red Mantis focus spells you gain.

You can prepare two cantrips and one 1st-level spell each day from those found in your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for casting divine spells. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is 魅力.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bzKBUK6CH8tuLCfo]{Advanced Red Mantis Magic} 专长 6

先决条件 Basic Red Mantis Magic

Your Red Mantis magical training has improved. Add two 2nd-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 2nd-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

At 8th level, add two 3rd-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 3rd-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

At 10th level, add two 4th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook. You gain a 4th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M2V1vqAziOkWV30B]{Crimson Shroud} 专长 6

Frequency A number of times per day equal to your number of class feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype

先决条件 Red Mantis Assassin Dedication

You swathe yourself in a veil of red mist for 1 minute. While the shroud is active, you gain fast healing equal to half your level. You can Interact with your shroud, swirling it around you, to gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the beginning of your next turn. Finally, if you die while the shroud is active, you can choose to have your entire body vanish into red mist, leaving behind only your gear; you make this choice when you activate Crimson Shroud.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4YeHOPzo3zOhZQCh]{Mantis Form} 专长 8

先决条件 Basic Red Mantis Magic

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bKDsmKVosexwJ80i]{Mantis Form} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying to Achaekek or researching your assigned kill.

Ritualist.name: 主祭 Ritualist
Ritualist.description:
主祭 Ritualist

有人通过严谨的研究来学习仪式施法的技艺，但有些人就是如此天赋异禀，凭借着天赋与运气便能以惊人的技巧执行仪式，这甚至与他们是否想主动运用这股力量无关。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.kU4K9jj9qnktoAaQ]{主祭入门 Ritualist Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 expert in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

你已经开始掌握施放仪式这项困难的技艺。你在执行仪式的所有主要检定中获得+2环境加值。

你习得两个罕见仪式，这些仪式的等级不能超过你等级的一半；你必须满足施放仪式的所有先决条件才能选取它。在8级以及之后的每4级，你都会学会另一个罕见仪式，这些仪式的等级也不能超过你等级的一半，且你必须满足它的先决条件。

你能作为主要施法者施放这些仪式，但是你无法将仪式传授给它人，也不能允许它人成为这些仪式的主要施法者——除非他们也熟知这些仪式。

特殊 直至选取另外两个主祭变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。若你重训这个专长，你便会失去由于此专长而习得的仪式。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bmWvMfYxZbZtigDp]{灵活主祭 Flexible Ritualist} 专长 6

先决条件 主祭入门

你自己一人能在仪式中担任两个职责。

当你施放仪式时，能够将次要施法者的数量降低1人。

当你这么做时，你必须满足任何仪式对次要施法者的要求，你需要如常尝试由该名次要施法者执行的次要检定。你不能替换作为法术目标参与仪式的次要施法者（比如@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{赎罪术 Atone}仪式）。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dAckQkpg1qyTz8od]{机敏主祭 Resourceful Ritualist} 专长 6

先决条件 主祭入门

你能执行刚好超出了你自身技能水平的困难仪式。当仪式要求专家熟练度而你的熟练度为受训、要求大师熟练度而你的熟练度为专家、或者要求传奇熟练度而你为大师时，你也能尝试检定以施放该仪式。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jYKKnr41OqQrf7hv]{高效仪式 Efficient Rituals} 专长 8

先决条件 主祭入门

你能更快地执行某些仪式。若仪式正常的施放时间为一日，那么你可以用4个小时来施放它。若它的施放时间超过一日，那么你施放它所需要的天数减半并向上取整。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.v482u7QboZEbhgvv]{自信主祭 Assured Ritualist} 专长 10

先决条件 灵活主祭

你能掩盖一名次要施法者所犯下的错误。若你是主要施法者，在投掷了所有次要检定之后，选择次要施法者投掷出失败或大失败的一个检定，将该检定结果视为向着更加成功的方向提高1级。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TQCpXi1hwYX6VIhp]{高速仪式 Speedy Rituals} 专长 14

先决条件 高效仪式

执行仪式的常规时间是你所耗费的时间的数倍。若一个仪式的施放时间以日为单位，那么你能够以相同数量的小时数来施放它。若这么做的结果使得施放仪式的时间超过8个小时，那么你要将该仪式分为几日来完成，就如同正常的仪式所要求的一样。

Runelord.name: 符文领主 Runelord
Runelord.description:
符文领主 Runelord

稀有度 稀有

你遵循着符文领主的道路来学习奥术。你选定一个魔法学派解锁其奥秘，同时放弃了其他次等的学派。你了解到了符文魔法的奥秘，那是魔法的基本单元。但请注意：你也许会在追求力量的过程中屈服于罪恶。

你同时学会了使用长杆兵器，这是符文领主的标志性武器，并且可以领略被称为“艾恩石”的强大而古老的魔法物品的秘密，把它们嵌入你的肌肤。

补充专长 2nd @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z0HX5L7bOOrKi0dD]{刺青艺术家 Tattoo Artist}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.HYTaibaCGE85rhbZ]{符文领主专精 Runelord Specialization}

你增强了符文魔法，并且练习了你的学派相关武器。你获得一个额外的你所选择的奥术学派的戏法，并且每次你获得一个等级（包括本级）时，你都额外增加一个你所选择的奥术学派的法术到你的法术书中，其限制与你通常增加的两个法术相同。

特殊 在你获得其他两个符文领主变体专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EZrxp0XxYh9rjghB]{镶嵌艾恩石 Embed Aeon Stone} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}, 手艺受训

你发现了将艾恩石嵌入肉体的秘密。你花费一天的时间与艾恩石调和，并将其嵌入你的皮肤中。当石头被这样嵌入时，你会获得艾恩石的好处，就像它在你头顶上运行一样，但它能保护艾恩石不被发现或轻易偷走。在你身体中的艾恩石必须像正常一样绑定才能发挥作用。

你也可以用这项活动在一天内安全地移除嵌入的艾恩石。没有这个专长的人可以花一天时间通过@Check[type:medicine|dc:30|name:手术移除艾恩石]检定来尝试安全地移除它，或者更匆忙地，从尸体上扯下它。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OxvZSFGOjGfcSCv8]{艾恩石共鸣 Aeon Resonance} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EZrxp0XxYh9rjghB]{镶嵌艾恩石 Embed Aeon Stone}

你可以获得一块嵌入的艾恩石的共鸣能力，就像它被放置在寻路仪身上一样。虽然你可以在你的肉体中嵌入多个艾恩石，但你只能从一个嵌入的艾恩石中获得共鸣之力，每天在做日常准备时选择。

特殊 在8级时，你可以再次选择这个专长。如果你这样做，你最多可获得四个绑定的艾恩石的共鸣力量，而非只有一个。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NQTpuGhB7Rq9zJkt]{长柄武器技巧 Polearm Tricks} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}

你与符文魔法的联系揭示了一些技巧，使你手中的长柄武器更加致命。你可以获得长武的重击专精效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zAJY8rLvZjzOK0Mt]{原罪库藏 Sin Reservoir} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}

在每日准备中，你可以沉溺于你的原罪。当你这样做时，你获得一个额外法术位，最高比你当前能施展的最高等级法术低两级。你只能在这个法术位准备一个你的专精学派的法术。与其他行为一样，如果你的行为伤害了别人，沉溺于原罪可能会改变你的阵营。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AGovcdAzmUqxgiOq]{融合长兵 Fused Polearm} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}

需求 你的奥术联结物品是一把长杆武器。

在你的日常准备过程中，你可以用魔法将你的奥术联结武器和一根法杖融合一体，法杖将作为武器的柄。你同时准备了这根法杖，而且只能用你能准备的法杖进行这一行动。这种融合一直持续到你下次进行日常准备时。

当两者融合时，武器的柄部会呈现出法杖的外观特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xWWcxZUgQTaHZHkY]{学派法术反制 School Counterspell} 专长 12

先决条件 法术反制, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}

你对你学派的精奥学识让你可以轻易地抵消这一学派的法术。如果敌人施放的法术来自你的专精学派，你就可以用同一学派的的任何其他法术来反制它，而不必准备同一法术来进行法术反制。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ZB2WMbhALgQTGY3c]{学派法术逆转 School Spell Redirection} 专长 18

先决条件 法术反制, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mz2x4HFrWT8usbEL]{符文领主入门 Runelord Dedication}

当你反制一个与你的专精学派相符的法术时，如果你的反制检定大成功，或者你使用了一个比目标法术等级更高的法术位进行反制并成功，你可以重定向你反制的法术。你选择目标、区域以及该法术的其他各方面，并使用你自己的法术DC、法术攻击骰或其他适当的数据来确定效果。

Runescarred.name: Runescarred
Runescarred.description:
Runescarred

The rune magic of Thassilon and its descendant nations has left its mark on your very flesh. As a runescarred, you have an unusually close connection to this ancient magic, which has become a newly emerging field of study for small pockets of interested scholars in both Varisia and New Thassilon.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.luKAFJAvdbAgEwV7]{Runescarred Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Arcana

获取许可 You are from the Saga Lands.

Whether through blood (if you're Varisian, Shoanti, or New Thassilonian) or by exposure to rune magic, you have become runescarred, with visible, glowing runes on your body in the form of tattoos or scars. You might have possessed these marks before gaining the archetype, but you only truly became runescarred when you chose to study and tap into the runes' power. You become an expert in Arcana and you also become trained in Thassilon Lore, or an expert in Thassilon Lore if you were already trained in it.

Choose one cantrip from the arcane list. One of the runes on your body corresponds to the chosen cantrip, and you can cast the chosen cantrip as an innate arcane spell.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the runescarred变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FItD6HmjasjbLdgS]{Spell Runes} 专长 4

先决条件 Runescarred Dedication

The magical runes on your body grant you several magical abilities. Choose a 1st-level arcane spell. You gain a spell rune on your body corresponding to the chosen spell, which you can cast once per day as an innate spell. At 6th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 2nd-level arcane spell, and at 8th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 3rd-level arcane spell.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.MM9NcRyXWX2LFiuF]{Living Rune} 专长 6

先决条件 Runescarred Dedication

You've bridged a connection between the runes on your body and the magic of runestones, allowing you to place an armor rune on your living flesh. Your body can hold a single property rune; you can't etch a property rune on your body if it has requirements on the type or category of armor or if the property would affect the armor instead of its wearer. If you wear armor, you gain the property rune's effects in addition to any effects of that armor.

Warding Rune Feat 6

先决条件 Runescarred Dedication

Your runes provide a warding effect that protects you against a specific school of magic. Choose a school of magic other than divination. You gain a rune on your body corresponding to that school, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to all saving throws against effects of that school.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDHz1GVDk9xZeBYF]{Warding Rune (Abjuration)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lNNB4knWudR90GKf]{Warding Rune (Conjuration)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gZ4VdWKr3ag2BAvF]{Warding Rune (Enchantment)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XHvsWCs1m5UyLnMV]{Warding Rune (Evocation)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.IqkqDCCcCZqLbR0Z]{Warding Rune (Illusion)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XITZZqMSeqqzKYZx]{Warding Rune (Necromancy)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Zc0G5SreQNizRDlu]{Warding Rune (Transmutation)}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hRJV7byfPUHx1b9P]{Greater Spell Runes} 专长 10

先决条件 Spell Runes

You gain more powerful spell runes. You gain a spell rune corresponding to a 4th-level arcane spell. At 12th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 5th-level arcane spell, and at 14th level, you gain a spell rune corresponding to a 6th-level arcane spell.

Scout.name: 斥候 Scout
Scout.description:
斥候 Scout

你是间谍活动和侦查方面的专家，能够安静地潜伏在荒野中以获取情报，溜过敌人的封锁线向同伴传递讯息，或者对敌人果敢地发起突然袭击。你的技巧还能减缓自己与同伴旅行的困难，在具有潜在危险的时候保持警惕。

补充专长 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qqe5VmcO1s8iTOfd]{伪装 Camouflage}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qMa2fIP2nqrFzHrq]{斥候入门 Scout Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 隐秘和生存达到受训熟练度

你是受过高度训练的斥候，在面对任何情况时都有能力及时向盟友发出危险警告。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tpcq3Lk7qEOZ3LDP]{斥候警告 Scout's Warning} 游侠专长。

当你在使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{侦察 Scout}探索模式行动时，你会让盟友在先攻检定上获得+2环境加值，以取代原本的+1环境加值。

特殊 直至选取另外两个斥候变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6CE1nVGxt192AUGk]{斥候冲锋 Scout's Charge} 专长 4

先决条件 斥候入门

你无声地潜伏在敌人周边，在毫无警告的情况下突袭他们。

选择一名敌人，行走并对该敌人进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{虚招 Feint}，之后再对该敌人作出一次打击。对于此次虚招来说，你能够尝试隐秘检定来取代常规要求的欺骗检定，因为你是在利用周围的环境来攻其不备。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KOf6kmwAZaUJSDW9]{地形探查 Terrain Scout} 专长 4

先决条件 斥候入门

你获得两次@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.beyw5bdA5hkQbmaG]{地形潜伏 Terrain Stalker}技能专长，每次要选择不同的地形。

若你在探索模式中进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.IE2nThCmoyhQA0Jn]{避人耳目 Avoid Notice}，而且有盟友使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{跟随专家 Follow the Expert}来跟着你来行动，那么你可以从这些盟友中选择一名，使其获得你所具有的一个地形潜伏专长的好处。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hE6fchGuHuPIeKlO]{摇曳之影 Fleeting Shadow} 专长 6

先决条件 斥候入门

你能快速地从人们视线中消失并悄声移动。你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{躲藏 Hide}然后@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{潜行 Sneak}两次。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.elbj75qsUerbM725]{斥候神速 Scout's Speed} 专长 6

先决条件 斥候入门

你的速度很快，在旅行中尤甚，这让你能够在不拖慢盟友速度的前提下侦查前方并把情况回报给同伴。你的速度获得+10尺状态加值。在计算你的旅行速度时，这项加值增加至+20状态加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jvQoupE76OeUpjZp]{斥候猛扑 Scout's Pounce} 专长 10

先决条件 斥候入门

需求 对于你的所有敌人来说，你处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}状态，且你未处于任何敌人周边的10尺范围之内

你从阴影中现身打击敌人。至多以你的速度进行行走，之后打击两次。若你对于这些打击的敌人来说是藏匿或无踪（undetected）状态，你的敌人对于两次攻击来说均会处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

你的多重攻击减值如常适用于这两次攻击。

Scroll Trickster.name: 卷轴狂热者 Scroll Trickster
Scroll Trickster.description:
卷轴狂热者 Scroll Trickster

魔法从很久以前就以多种形式被文字记录下来了。从经典的羊皮卷到结绳记事，从陶土烧制的板块到捆扎的竹简，魔法无处不在。你只需要知道如何阅读这些物品便可。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uxHWqFbYD0ZvkeF8]{卷轴狂热者入门 Scroll Trickster Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 奥秘、自然、神秘或宗教达到受训熟练度

你全面研究了卷轴这种物品。这可能是在正规环境下的全面教育，也可能是你以某种方式获得了一些卷轴之后，想在尝试不把任何东西引爆的前提下使用卷轴时而学会的野路子。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{巧取魔法物品 Trick Magic Item}专长，而且你会在取巧使用卷轴的技能检定上获得+2环境加值。若你在对卷轴使用巧取魔法物品的检定中掷出大失败，则以失败来取代它。

特殊 直至选取另外两个卷轴狂热者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ROAUR1GhC19Pjk9C]{基础卷轴收藏 Basic Scroll Cache} 专长 6

先决条件 卷轴狂热者入门

你收藏了海量的卷轴碎片，这些碎片中充斥着拼写与绘制错误，溢出的能量就好像是从筛子里漏下来一般。只要足够小心，你就能把这些碎片整合成有效的物品——至少是暂时有效。

每日在你进行日常准备期间，你能够创造出1张临时卷轴，上面保存着1环法术。该法术必须来自核心手册的常见法术，或者也可以是你通过@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Q5iIYCFdqJFM31GW]{学习法术 Learn a Spell}已经习得的，对你来说，该法术的根源所对应技能的熟练度必须为受训。

这个卷轴是不稳定地、临时物品，若你没有使用它的话，该卷轴便会在你下次进行日常准备时失去魔力。这个卷轴不能用于学习法术（Learn a Spell）。

8级起，你可以添加第两个卷轴，该卷轴保存着2环法术。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HIyuVIh2XSDz3h2j]{卷轴略读法 Skim Scroll} 专长 8

先决条件 卷轴狂热者入门

当你从腰带上取下卷轴时，只需要粗略阅读便能启动卷轴上的魔法。你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{互动 Interact}来取出一个卷轴，之后对该卷轴使用@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR62fVC9FyQAMCO1]{巧取魔法物品 Trick Magic Item}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UrOj9TROtn8nuxPf]{专业卷轴收藏 Expert Scroll Cache} 专长 12

先决条件 基础卷轴收藏

你的卷轴藏品变得更加强力。

除了基础卷轴收藏中提供的每日卷轴以外，再添加一个保存3环法术的卷轴。14级时，再添加一个保存4环法术的卷轴。16级时，再添加一个保存5环法术的卷轴。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lIg5Gzz7W70jfbk1]{大师卷轴收藏 Master Scroll Cache} 专长 18

先决条件 专业卷轴收藏

你的卷轴藏品让人大开眼界，它们充盈着魔力，使你能够比普通卷轴狂热者准备更多临时卷轴。

除了基础和专业卷轴收藏中提供的每日卷轴以外，再添加一个保存6环法术的卷轴。20级时，再添加一个保存6环法术的卷轴。

Scrollmaster.name: Scrollmaster
Scrollmaster.description:
Scrollmaster

Members who align themselves with the Scrolls branch of the Pathfinder Society are fervent seekers of lore, experts in esoterica, and masters of the wealth of knowledge at the Society's disposal. In addition to maintaining and researching the Society's massive collection of tomes and artifacts, these scholars are also eager to adventure in order to add to the Pathfinder's archives. They take tremendous pride in their ability to thoroughly observe, research, and catalog creatures and events. Members of the Scrolls value knowledge and preparation above strength and cunning, and they work to hone their intellectual skills. As a Scrollmaster, you are an elite member of this arm of the Society.

Pathfinder Society Archetypes

The following archetypes are uncommon, but are available to members of the Pathfinder Society. Qualifying characters with the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.o3C85NHW08Y2inAN]{Pathfinder Agent} archetype can select one of these dedication feats even if they have not gained three feats from the Pathfinder agent archetype, and each of these archetypes' feats fulfills the Pathfinder Agent Dedication's special requirement despite not being from the Pathfinder agent变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uhfZtjbfJ8pZIWrF]{Scrollmaster Dedication} 专长 6

Archetype Scrollmaster
先决条件 expert in any Lore skill, member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Scrolls

Your experience chronicling adventures and discoveries grants you heightened discernment and memory. For 24 hours after learning a prominent fact-such as the name of an NPC you have met, the details of your mission briefing, and similar information-you can recall it without attempting a check, though this doesn't allow you to automatically memorize long strings of numbers or text. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to remember a detail that has come up before in the current adventure, even if it was more than 24 hours ago.

If you have the@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0Dy8RlFqrzCVOTl4]{Thorough Reports} 专长 and have expert proficiency in the skill you're using to Recall Knowledge, your circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about creatures from that feat increases to +4.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Scrollmaster变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.agWNAYqgyV58jlxm]{Foolproof Instructions} 专长 8

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You feel confident that you can explain your scrolls so well that even your allies can use them... hopefully. During your daily preparations, you can select a single scroll and instruct a single ally in its use. Until your next daily preparations, the ally can attempt to use the scroll with a single action that has the manipulate trait. The ally rolls the skill corresponding to the spellcasting tradition. The GM determines the DC based on the scroll's level, possibly adjusted for the situation. If the spell has a spell attack bonus or a spell DC, use your level as the proficiency bonus and the highest of your ally's Intelligence, Wisdom, or 魅力 modifiers.

成功 For the rest of the ally's turn, they can spend actions to Cast the Spell.

Failure The ally misremembers your instructions and can't use the scroll this turn.

Critical Failure The ally misunderstood your instructions and can't use the scroll.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QYZovCDjOhBb1u01]{Innate Magical Intuition} 专长 8

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You've spent countless hours learning to recognize and predict a creature's innate magical abilities. The first time you successfully Recall Knowledge to identify a creature, in addition to any information you learn from your successful check, you learn the names of three of the highest-level innate spells it can cast, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your next save against an innate spell cast by that creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BFgrPAK2v3GSKQ5e]{Lore Seeker} 专长 8

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You see what others don't, and you've developed magical tricks to find hidden truth. You can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vTQvfYu2llKQedmY]{Comprehend Language}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Et8RSCLx8w7uOLvo]{Restore Senses}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.jwK43yKsHTkJQvQ9]{See Invisibility} as innate spells, each once per day. If you could already cast spells, these spells are of the same tradition. Otherwise, they are arcane spells, you use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9WMLIcHpwkQpUQfz]{Magic Finder} 专长 8

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You've learned a few tricks to ensure you find every last magic item and interesting magical effect during your missions. You can cast detect magic and read aura as innate spells at will. You can also cast locate as an innate spell once per day, but only to locate magic items, not specific mundane objects or types of objects. If you could already cast spells, these spells are of the same tradition. Otherwise, they're arcane spells, you use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells.

When you cast detect magic or read aura from this feat on an item or creature under the effect of a magic aura spell or interact with an item under the effect of an item facade spell, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your check to disbelieve the illusion.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PaUpesy5lyDLlwud]{Transcribe Moment} 专长 8

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.NxOYiKCqcuAHVRCj]{Transcribe Moment} focus spell. If you don't already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by spending 10 minutes to study a text or record notes on your recent experiences.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.2Tla5D1vpGioh42x]{Unravel Mysteries} 专长 8

先决条件 master in a Decipher Writing skill, Scrollmaster Dedication

You can understand the true meaning of texts quickly, and even when you get lost or hit a dead end, you aren't discouraged from making further attempts to get to the bottom of things. When you Decipher Writing, you need only half as long as usual (reducing the time from about 1 minute to about half a minute per page), and if you fail, you don't take the usual -2 circumstance penalty to further checks to decipher that text.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ADgQzThbtGKvp6hy]{Bestiary Scholar} 专长 10

先决条件 master in Arcana, Crafting, Nature, Occultism, or Religion; Scrollmaster Dedication

You learn how to apply your extensive knowledge of certain creatures using the lore you know. When you gain this feat, choose one of the following skills in which you have attained master proficiency: Arcana, Crafting, Nature, Occultism, or Religion. You can use the chosen skill to Recall Knowledge to identify any creature normally identifiable by any of the above skills. In addition, when you critically succeed at identifying a creature, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next attack roll or saving throw against that creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EpWgrMznGbm8gceW]{Cautious Delver} 专长 10

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

You've studied the many ways that ancient architects and spellcasters protected their possessions, such as by implementing deadly traps and curses, and learned some magic to counteract them. You can cast dispel magic, knock, and resist energy as innate spells, each once per day. If you can already cast spells, these spells are of the same tradition.

Otherwise, they're arcane spells, you use Intelligence as your spellcasting ability, and you become trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for arcane spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.o8ogNJ53l1JDIJud]{Font of Knowledge} 专长 10

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

Experience or focused study have granted you mastery of a number of topics. When you know about something, you know about it in great detail. When you succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, at the GM's discretion, you might gain even more additional information or context than normal.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TNV1cs1VFqdj4D2M]{Masterful Obfuscation} 专长 10

先决条件 master in a skill with the Recall Knowledge action, Scrollmaster Dedication

You've mastered the art of deceiving others about your area of study. When you gain this feat, choose one skill with the Recall Knowledge action in which you have attained master proficiency. You can attempt to deceive others about the truth of facts and knowledge related to that skill-such as by pretending to know something that you don't, planting false information, or the like-using the Lie action of the Deception skill. When you Lie in this way, attempt your skill check using the skill you selected when you gained this feat instead of Deception, applying all bonuses or penalties related from the selected skill to the check. While it's easier to convince someone who knows nothing about your chosen false information, on a critical success, you can even convince someone who has heard something contradictory, unless they have reason to be certain from direct experience. For instance, you might say, "I know you may have heard to use silver weapons against vampires, but that's a misconception based on conflating them with werewolves. According to all credible scholars, cold iron will do the trick." Once a creature realizes you've used masterful obfuscation to Lie to them, either from a failed check or due to later discovering the falsehood, you can't use this feat against them again, as it relies on blind trust in your superior knowledge. However, you can still Lie to them normally.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OyOpHPOXC08bffVR]{Determined Lore Seeker} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BFgrPAK2v3GSKQ5e]{Lore Seeker}

You've mastered useful spells that let you find hidden truths others might miss, and a preferred spell comes naturally to you. When you gain this feat, choose one of the innate spells granted by the Lore Seeker feat: comprehend language, restore senses, or see invisibility. You can cast this spell three times per day instead of once per day. When you cast any of the spells granted by Lore Seeker as innate spells, they gain additional effects. When you cast comprehend language, the spell is heightened to 4th level. When you cast restore senses,the spell is heightened to half your level, rounded up. When you cast see invisibility, for the duration of the spell you can use an action, which has the concentrate trait, to see invisible creatures normally (instead of seeing them as translucent shapes that are concealed to you) until the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.S8Hda5OtajS9gpqM]{Ward Mind} 专长 16

先决条件 Scrollmaster Dedication

需求 You're currently affected by a mental effect that you gained by failing, but not critically failing, a saving throw.

触发 Your turn ends.

To protect the knowledge within your mind from intrusion or erasure, you ward yourself against a mental attack, temporarily delaying its effects. Until the end of your next turn, you ignore a single mental effect that meets the requirement. You can suppress a particular effect using Ward Mind or Cognitive Loophole only once, even if you have both feats.

特殊 You can use this reaction even if the mental effect prevents you from using reactions.

Scrounger.name: 拾荒工匠 Scrounger
Scrounger.description:
拾荒工匠 Scrounger

你已经在拆卸并重装复杂物品上花费了大量的时间，就为了搞明白它们的运作方式，这使得你获得了以近乎不可能的材料制作任何物品的技巧。尽管你临时拼凑的物品没法使用多久，但它们往往是在紧急时刻你最为需要的东西，而敌人也会发现把你缴械或许不难，但如何让你维持两手空空才是真正的挑战。上锁的房间、诡秘的陷阱和各种绝境对你来说只是一道道谜题，而身边这些平凡物品则是拼凑出解决方案的拼图。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CaeCSWFWytWv8Fgu]{拾荒工匠入门 Scrounger Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 手艺达到受训熟练度

即便在没有适当工具或工坊的前提下，你也能@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制作 Craft} 物品，不过你会在手艺检定上承受-2物品减值。

此外，你不需要实体的公式书就能够记住你的所有公式；你仍需要支付相应的开销才能学习它们，但你可以完全凭记忆记住这些内容。

无论何时何地，只要你手边恰好有任何材料，你就能够制造临时物品，这只需要10分钟来执行初始手艺检定。这件临时物品必须为常见、非魔法、1级或更低等级的物品，且必须为武器、护甲或不可消耗的一件冒险装备，不可消耗的冒险装备刊载于核心手册中。你能创造10个单一类型的弹药以取代制造一件物品。这是件劣质物品，但是当你使用由此专长创造出的劣质物品时，你不会承受常规应当受到的减值。

你的临时物品在分解成构成它的原始组件前能够存续 [[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 小时}；GM要秘密投掷小时数量。你只能创造实体物品，而非信息或魔法，因此举例来说，你能够创造空白的笔记本或1张随机纸张，但你不能用它来创造学术期刊或宗教文本。

你能将手头上的任何材料或物品组合在一起，即便通常来说他们并非用于制造某件物品所用的材料类型，不过你仍旧需要足够体积的材料来做出你想制作的物品。

除非你所使用的全部材料都适用于制作该类型物品，否则你会在手艺检定上承受-5减值（若你使用的材料及其不适合制作该物品，则会承受-10减值，具体由GM进行判断）。

特殊 直至选取另外两个拾荒工匠变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.f0s3WwaJN5f2UTYY]{逆向工程 Reverse Engineering} 专长 4

先决条件 手艺达到专家熟练度，拾荒工匠入门

你比大多数人更擅长通过逆向工程把物品拆解并记录成公式。你在通过逆向工程（reverse engineer）来从一件物品中获取公式的手艺检定中获得+2环境加值。

此外，若你在手艺检定中掷出大成功，则不仅能创造出该物品的公式，还能够同时将原物品重组起来，使你获得公式以及原物品，以取代仅仅获得公式和相当于物品价值一半的原材料。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vW8dGtOD3rZVOJoq]{高质量拾荒工匠 High-quality Scrounger} 专长 8

先决条件 拾荒工匠入门

当你使用拾荒工匠入门@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制造 Craft} 临时物品时，它还可以是至高3级的物品（但该物品仍然需要属于武器、护甲、或不可消耗的一件冒险装备）。

你能把它制作出来为其他某个人所用，让他避免由于使用劣质物品而承受的减值作为替代，但你会在使用该临时物品时承受减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TkCy7jZUjhD8IypE]{专业拆解 Expert Disassembly} 专长 7

先决条件 手艺达到大师熟练度，拾荒工匠入门

你能够使用和逆向工程相同的技术来拆解物品并使其失效。你能使用手艺取代贼活来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{解除装置 Disable Device}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2EE4aF4SZpYf0R6H]{开锁 Pick a Lock}。

Sentinel.name: 卫士 Sentinel
Sentinel.description:
卫士 Sentinel

在激烈的战斗中，一身坚固的护甲总是能提供最实在而安心的防护。而你，一个将战斗作为日常工作的人，更是恨不得让你身上的每一块甲片都发挥出两倍的防御力。当投身沙场时，你总是身披着你能穿上的最精良的护甲。依靠它，你――也许还有你保护的同伴――总能在危机四伏的战斗中成为最后的幸存者。你的卫士生涯的开端也许是某个骑士团或是保镖公司，它让你学会了利用重甲防护自己的战技；当然，你也可能只是一个loot里有太多护甲的冒险者，而你从来不拒绝更多的loot――所以你把它们全都穿到身上。或者，也有一些脑洞比较大巫师和术士会学习如何穿着重甲施放法术，只当是增加自己在战斗中的生存率的手段。

补充专长 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bYijGvCvCmJnW6aA]{牺牲护甲 Sacrifice Armor}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ygPrwqiyDr1frUHw]{高等干涉 Greater Interpose}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8foxmfC6FFT3oYpV]{卫士入门 Sentinel Dedication} 专长 2

你学会了优化自己所穿着的护甲的防护性能的诀窍。

你获得对穿戴轻甲和中甲的受训。如果你已经受训穿着轻甲和中甲，那么你获得对穿戴重甲的受训。

如果你因为职业能力而在任何护甲（无甲防御除外）上获得了专家或是更高的熟练等级，你在本专长赋予你的护甲的熟练度上也会提升到相应的等级。在13级时，如果你因为职业能力而在无甲防御上获得了专家或是更高的熟练等级，你在本专长赋予你的护甲的熟练度上也会提升到相应的等级。

特殊 直至选取另外两个卫士变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uxwHHjWs3ehqtG4b]{着甲如肤 Steel Skin} 专长 4

先决条件 生存达到受训熟练度，卫士入门

你身穿的铠甲也能收放自如，如同它是你的另一层皮肤一样。你可以在穿着中甲时如常的休息。如果你在穿着重甲的熟练等级上达到了大师级，那么你可以在穿着重甲时如常的休息。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7NdMHszAiiveihoW]{护甲专精 Armor Specialist} 专长 6

先决条件 卫士入门

你努力继续优化自己穿着护甲的防御效果。你获得中甲和重甲的盔甲专精效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jwcNyPDVw313KXZU]{反应装甲 Armored Rebuff} 专长 8

先决条件 卫士入门

触发 一个邻近敌人对你发动的一次近战武器或无武装攻击的攻击检定结果为大失败

需求 你穿着中甲或重甲

你用厚重的铠甲弹开奋力尝试攻击你的敌人。对触发本反应动作的生物尝试一次运动技能检定来 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{推撞 Shove}它。你不能在成功的推撞以后跟随被你撞开的生物一起移动——你使用铠甲弹开了它，而非使用自己移动的动能推动它。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.5TPKikTyN7lrCvzY]{重装壁垒 Mighty Bulwark} 专长 10

先决条件 卫士入门

你和你的护甲之间的结合是如此紧密无间，它就像是你的甲壳一样保护着你趟过各种险境。你在穿着一件具有壁垒特性的护甲时，它的壁垒反射豁免加值从+3上升到+4。除此之外，护甲的壁垒反射豁免加值现在可以应用到你所有的反射豁免检定上，而非仅能用来对抗伤害性的效果。

Shadowcaster.name: 暗影秘使 Shadowcaster
Shadowcaster.description:
暗影秘使 Shadowcaster

稀有度 罕见

世界充满了阴影，但每个活着的生物在内心都拥有某种形式的光明，能抵御周围的黑暗……除了暗影秘使。将灵魂中的那部分卖出之后，暗影秘使解除了限制器，并获得了根植于黑暗的魔法力量；然而，这种交易也将他们暴露在来自暗影国度的异界低语中。

补充专长 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bcxIg7wi8ZAhvhOD]{魔宠 Familiar}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N7dTFxpjXGn4ddq8]{强化魔宠 Enhanced Familiar}; 12级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tha0L3Z6608JrUwN]{阴影魔法 Shadow Magic}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NM5a1tF0OW5mVYdR]{额外阴影魔法 Additional Shadow Magic}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C4m59yjuDmZLnTqu]{影相 Shadow Illusion}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.F7Ao9p17ocf3JVvy]{影怒 Shadow Power}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 能够施展法术

你献祭了灵魂的一部分，允许阴影的力量进入你的体内，并改造你魔法的本质。你不再能够施展具有光亮特征的法术；如果一个能力，像是职业特性或族裔专长，会自动给你一个光亮法术，例如给予你@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.zul5cBTfr7NXHBZf]{炫目强光 Dazzling Flash}法术的@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{领域入门 Domain Initiate}专长，你不会获得该法术。

你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.SE0fbgBj7atuukdv]{暗影披风 Cloak of Shadow}领域法术。需要消耗1点聚能点以施展聚能法术。该专长为你提供一个拥有1点聚能点的聚能池，而且你可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}行动恢复聚能点数。你可以冥想从影界中汲取力量并填充你的聚能池以进行再聚能。你从暗影秘使变体中获得的领域法术和你用来满足暗影秘使变体先决条件的法术具有相同的根源。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从暗影秘使变体中获得了其他两个专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.f69C05QokaBrDFjn]{影法术 Shadow Spells} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication}

深藏的黑暗在你耳边低语，教导你所属根源的其他施法者永远不会告诉你的暗影秘密。将@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{幽影爆破 Shadow Blast}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tcwT97RWKxsJiefG]{幽影虹吸 Shadow Siphon}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rxvS7EMJ7qmexAyA]{行影术 Shadow Walk}，以及@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.srEKUvym9kDVbEhD]{幻影复制 Replicate}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hvKtmoHwekDZ5iOH]{幽影军团 Shadow Army}，@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.8cuqRFB3mWBOgy61]{重影射弹 Shadow Projectile}，和@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VTb0yI6P1bLkzuRr]{幽影突袭 Shadow Raid}加入你的法术表中。你因此可能学习这些法术，即使它们通常不属于你所属根源的法术表。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TszXKspPffCzCD0X]{阴影门徒 Disciple of Shade} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication}

你在暗影秘密中深入钻研，得到了魔法力量的祝福，使你在欺骗和劝说的技能上获得强化。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YQWq1DZuLRk32M3h]{面相莫测 Inscrutable Mask}领域法术。将聚能池中的聚能点数提升1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eGgSGU1LOaRNRYR7]{影法 Shadow Spell} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication}

你将一片幽影附着在法术上，能屏蔽感官并引发危害。如果你的下一个动作是施展具有幽影特征的法术，选择一个受法术影响的生物。该生物要么在隐秘检定上获得+2状态加值，要么在察觉检定上获得-2状态罚值（由你选择）。这持续1轮。该选择和效果在结算完法术初始效果的所有检定后才发生。如果被选择的生物是你的敌人，只在你的法术攻击骰成功，或者他在豁免骰中失败才受影响。

影法的效果在你再次使用影法的时候终止。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RLWbx2itF1jmW0OL]{影藏 Shadow Reservoir} 专长 10

先决条件 能够使用法术位施法, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication}

你自己的影子在与你对话，为你提供法术的知识以及魔法力量的源泉。你的影藏在你可以通过法术位施展的最高环级法术低至少2级的每个法术环级都含有一个法术。这些法术必须来自你的法术表，必须能够被你接触，并且必须需要一个攻击骰或一个豁免骰。这些法术不需要被准备，也不在你的法术库中。

无论你以何种方式施展法术，你可以自发地使用一个同环级法术位施展来自影藏的法术。如果你是一个准备施法者，你失去准备在该法术位的法术。

从你的影藏施展的法术获得幽影特征。如果该法术需要攻击骰，使用目标AC或意志DC中较高的。如果该法术需要豁免骰，目标使用意志豁免或法术通常豁免中较高的。每当一个生物在对抗来自你的影藏的法术的豁免骰中失败时，你在你的肉体上获得了一个由纯阴影材料形成的小纹身。

如果你可以通过法术位施展超过一个来源的法术，例如你是拥有兼职变体的暗影秘使，为你的影藏选择一个来源。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FA1s2jjZqoBy58Xx]{暗影之秘 Secrets of Shadow} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RLWbx2itF1jmW0OL]{影藏 Shadow Reservoir}

你的影子的声音变得更加清晰；他将真实力量的秘密告诉你，并从伤害中保护你的肉体。你的影藏在你可以施展的最高法术环级低1级的法术环级上获得1个法术，加在它已经涵盖的所有更低环级的法术之上。

另外，由施展幽影法术带来的纹身能够从有害能量中保护你。你获得负能量抗力，数值等于你所能通过法术位施展的最高法术环级；如果你有负能量治疗（或其他形式的被正能量而非负能量伤害的能力），你改为获得同等数值的正能量抗力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.q0DGOuLuJNLzgM8d]{无尽虚空 Unending Emptiness} 专长 14

先决条件 聚能池, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ncrNQcwm4gOQRAA3]{暗影秘使入门 Shadowcaster Dedication}

你将阴影的力量充满你的眼睛，获得了能将视野所及的黑暗收入由破碎虚空形成的汹涌法球之中。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sFwoKj0TsacsmoWj]{黑光术 Darklight}领域法术。将聚能池中的聚能点数提升1点。

Shadowdancer.name: 影舞者 Shadowdancer
Shadowdancer.description:
影舞者 Shadowdancer

阴影乃是恐惧的兄弟。在阴影的庇护中，怪物徘徊，阴谋策划，尖牙、利刃和邪术从它黑暗的壁垒中探出，袭击无知无觉的目标。然而有一些不同寻常之人拥抱了阴影，他们从其中汲取力量，并随着它幽暗的摇曳翩翩起舞。

一个真正的影舞者永远生活在黑暗和光明的夹缝之间行走在漆黑如墨的无形道路上。影舞者通常是特工、刺客、潜伏人员和使节。一些影舞者使用它们编织黑暗的技艺行善，而另一些则将自己全身心投入无边的黑夜，成为它恐怖而反复无常的化身。

不过，无论影舞者拥有各种道德观念，与他们为伴的阴影都终将会成为他们不可分割的一部分，把这些人变成幽暗、诡秘和难以捉摸的生物。

补充专长：10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4Cc0gQauzUqcYdLw]{直觉闪避 Uncanny Dodge}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.emjWa77ltL5FytvA]{阴影来袭 Spring from the Shadows}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.DM9rjXZrmx2MFX7k]{看破一切 Sense The Unseen}; 18级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wPJFEUOXwf7y5jN3]{认知漏洞 Cognitive Loophole}

阴影的呼唤 CALL OF SHADOWS

阴影存在会以复杂多变的过程召唤一个潜在的影舞者与它同行。首先，它在这些人的心中投射恐惧――对黑暗的恐惧、对潜在敌人的恐惧、或是一种莫名的、对于控制黑暗的力量的焦灼渴求。许多影舞者都在走上这条道路之前聆听过这种召唤。起初，这种低语非常的微弱，大部分人都会将它当作是自己的大脑在玩弄的把戏而忽略掉它。而当真正的召唤出现时，它变得清晰而响亮，让之前影舞者听到的呼唤显得黯然失色。在Pathfinder世界的许多暗夜笼罩之地――比如阴影国度奈多、乌斯塔拉夫和魔鬼帝国切利亚斯，政府会积极地打探和征召拥有影舞者天赋的人，将他们训练成能干的间谍和刺客。但事实上，生活在任何地域的任何种族都有可能听见阴影开出的条件。唯一决定一个影舞者是否诞生的契机在于：体验者有没有决心接受这种召唤并与阴影存在达成契约。

理所当然，对于普罗大众来说，影舞者们与黑暗共事的名声和他们诡秘的习性让这些人很难与正义或是善良画上等号。然而阴影并没有特定的道德标准。一个影舞者完全可以是属于善良，甚至守序阵营的黑暗战士。不过，这些影舞者中的异类总是十分稀少，难以成为典型。

影舞者聚能法术 SHADOWDANCER FOCUS SPELLS

5环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BGEf9Sv5rgNBCk0]{影舞 Dance of Darkness}; @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5ttAVJbWg2GVKmrN]{影跃 Shadow Jump}; 6环 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EOWh6VVcSjB3WPjX]{影相 Shadow Illusion}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1AgirzUGkyDdmENy]{影舞者入门 Shadowdancer Dedication} 专长 8

先决条件 隐秘达到大师熟练度，表演达到专家熟练度

你接受了阴影的呼唤。你的体色变得灰沉和阴暗，你的感官适应了黑暗的环境，并且你可以更容易地在阴影中容身。你获得高等黑暗视觉。

当你身处黑暗或是昏暗的环境中时，你的隐秘技能检定获得+2环境加值。

特殊 直至选取另外两个影舞者变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.N16lctDPZpvk9Khq]{阴影偷袭 Shadow Sneak Attack} 专长 10

先决条件 影舞者入门

你获得游荡者的 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.j1JE61quDxdge4mg]{偷袭 Sneak Attack} 职业能力，无论你当前的等级，你的偷袭造成[[/r {1d6}[precision]]]{1d6点额外精准伤害}。

多个赋予你偷袭能力的来源不会互相叠加：如果你从其他的来源中也获得了偷袭能力，在计算偷袭伤害时你只能使用其中最高的一项。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tha0L3Z6608JrUwN]{阴影魔法 Shadow Magic} 专长 10

先决条件 影舞者入门

你获得了影舞者独有的，用于塑造和调整阴影的魔法技艺。

从以下两个影舞者聚能法术中选择一个：@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BGEf9Sv5rgNBCk0]{影舞 Dance of Darkness} 或是 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5ttAVJbWg2GVKmrN]{影跃 Shadow Jump}。 ，你学会这个法术。如果你还没有获得任何聚能池，现在你获得一个具有1点聚能的聚能池。你可以在昏暗或黑暗光照条件的区域中冥想10分钟时间来@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OSefkMgojBLqmRDh]{再聚能 Refocus}。

影舞者聚能法师是异能法术。你在异能法术攻击检定和异能法术DC上获得受训。你在这些法术上的施法者关键属性是魅力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NM5a1tF0OW5mVYdR]{额外阴影魔法 Additional Shadow Magic} 专长 12

先决条件 阴影魔法

选择一个你没有在获得阴影魔法专长时选择的聚能法术，你习得这个聚能法术，并且你的聚能池增加1点。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.C4m59yjuDmZLnTqu]{影相 Shadow Illusion} 专长 12

先决条件 阴影魔法

你独特的眼力和手艺可以让你自由使用阴影塑造半实相物体。你习得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EOWh6VVcSjB3WPjX]{影相 Shadow Illusion} 聚能法术，并且你的聚能池增加1点。你在异能法术攻击检定和异能法术DC上获得专家级熟练等级。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.F7Ao9p17ocf3JVvy]{影怒 Shadow Power} 专长 14

先决条件 阴影魔法

你将阴影聚集成一道破坏性的轰击。你习得 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IqJ9URobmJ9L9UBG]{幽影爆破 Shadow Blast} 作为每天可施放一次的自发异能法术。这个法术的环级总是比你的影舞者聚能法术的环级低1级。你在异能法术攻击检定和异能法术DC上获得专家级熟练等级。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BqcAwmNjDlKEI84X]{阴影之主 Shadow Master} 专长 18

先决条件 阴影魔法

阴影保护你的身躯，它坚逾任何人造的护甲并赋予你讲敌人拖入阴影的手腕。

当你身处在昏暗或黑暗光照条件的区域中时，你获得对除了力场伤害以及附有@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch}魔法符文的武器@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{打击 Strikes}伤害以外的所有伤害类型抗力5。

另外当你身处在昏暗或黑暗光照条件的区域中时，你可以在进行反射豁免检定时双骰取高。这是一个幸运效果。

Sixth Pillar.name: 第六柱 Sixth Pillar
Sixth Pillar.description:
第六柱 Sixth Pillar

第六根柱遵循将武术与魔法结合的传统。传统上，这是一种更好地集中和利用内在或血统法术的方法，但它可以被任何可以施法的人所使用。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cTeRwExCGhfwJbkl]{第六柱入门 Sixth Pillar Dedication} 专长 8

先决条件 敏捷14, 特技达到专家熟练度，能施法

你用肉体训练来引导魔法。如果你的非武装攻击至少为专家熟练度，那么你的法术攻击的熟练度将提升为专家。同样的，如果你的法术攻击至少为专家熟练度，你的非武装攻击的熟练度将提升为专家。你的运动技能将提升为专家。

特殊 在你从该变体中获得其他两个专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT0pVPqFuiEsmRb8]{六柱架势 Six Pillars Stance} 专长 10

先决条件 第六柱入门

需求 你未穿甲

你站稳身躯，让意志和身躯都坚硬如铁，这样你就可以不受干扰地使用魔法。在此架势下，你在使用具有专注或操作特征的动作时，针对所触发的反应动作，在AC上有+4环境加值。此外，当你在此架势下施放需要一个或多个动作的法术时，你的非武装攻击在伤害上获得+1环境加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.HJBDFHIaJ3lfxcbs]{腾挪施法 Maneuvering Spell} 专长 12

先决条件 第六柱入门

触发 你开始施展一个需要至少两个动作施法的法术。

你能立即利用你正在施展的法术的魔力，在战场上快速机动。你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{快步 Step}、@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}或@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OdIUybJ3ddfL7wzj]{起身 Stand}。此动作可以在你施法前或施法后使用。

@Compendium[Pf2e.Feats-Srd.W1GFspPIQ9f5MbFL]{接触聚焦 Touch Focus} 专长 14

先决条件 第六柱入门

你可以重定向法术，使得其力量穿过自己的身体，以此在打击距离内传递它。如果你的下个动作是施展一个目标为1或多个目标的、射程比接触更远的法术，你能将射程改为接触。若被改变的法术需要进行法术攻击骰，你在攻击骰上获得+2环境加值。若原法术可影响超过一个目标，该超魔也只允许你用该法术接触一个目标。在你施法之后，你能对目标发动一次卸武、推撞、摔绊或以非武装攻击进行一次打击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sFAqKrzqXQhtrfqN]{第六柱精通 Sixth Pillar Mastery} 专长 16

先决条件 第六柱入门

你的高度自律让你的身体潜能与魔法相谐调。如果你的非武装攻击至少为大师熟练度，那么你的法术攻击的熟练度将提升为大师。同样的，如果你的法术攻击至少为大师熟练度，你的非武装攻击的熟练度将提升为大师。

Snarecrafter.name: 圈套师 Snarecrafter
Snarecrafter.description:
圈套师 Snarecrafter

你可以用看似平淡无奇的部件组装出具有致命杀伤力的圈套――能够快速设计和设置的一种简单陷阱。当然，很少有什么陷阱可以在公平的面对面较量中起到和刀剑一样的决定性作用，所以你从来不考虑和敌人公平的较量。当战斗在你设计好的区域中展开时，你准备的五花八门的圈套可以为你赢得相当的优势。在陷阱环生的场景中，敌人要么不小心踩进你的圈套，要么而被你恶毒的布局逼向你更擅长正面作战的盟友，甚至是被无所不在的陷阱逼的寸步难行，不敢轻易挪动哪怕一个脚趾。

补充专长：8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KW6K5Zv4J7ClWkKA]{快速圈套 Quick Snares}; 10级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.27R8yZcY2uXH6pZN]{强力圈套 Powerful Snares}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OrNcWu1Y7c2O5zU6]{闪电圈套 Lightning Snares}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4MUbwilvb9dI0X59]{圈套师入门 Snarecrafter Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 手艺达到受训熟练度，制作圈套

你了解了如何免费制作少量圈套的方法。每天在你的每日准备阶段，你都可以根据你所拥有的圈套设计图制作最多四个可以迅速设置的圈套。在此期间，如果某一个圈套通常需要你花费一分钟时间 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制作 Craft}，那么你只需要使用3个@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{交互 Interact}动作就可以将它制作出来。当你在手艺技能上达到大师级熟练度时，你可以准备六个这样的圈套；当你在手艺技能上达到传奇级熟练度时，你可以准备八个这样的圈套。

你不需要事先准备任何材料便可以制作这些圈套。

特殊 在决定其他专长的先决条件时，本专长可以视为 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0haS0qXR9xTYKoTG]{圈套专家 Snare Specialist} 游侠专长。如果你同时拥有圈套专家游侠专长，你每天可以@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.KW6K5Zv4J7ClWkKA]{快速圈套 Quick Snares}制作的临时圈套数量叠加计算。你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从圈套师变体中获得了其他两个专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wqrOVv9gnqF4nlLR]{圈套突袭 Surprise Snare} 专长 4

先决条件 圈套师入门
