你可以在被一个敌人占据的空间内以迅雷不及掩耳的速度布设一个圈套。这个圈套必须是一个在正常情况下时间不超过一分钟时间 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.rmwa3OyhTZ2i2AHl]{制作 Craft}的圈套。

在布设以后，这个圈套会立刻被触发，但它的效果DC、攻击检定或是其他必要的检定投骰都会受到-2环境减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sk5HspGGnLW8b6bX]{遥控触发 Remote Trigger} 专长 6

先决条件 圈套师入门

你可以遥控激活一个圈套，在远距离上使它自动触发攻击目标，或是用类似的手法远远地打爆敌人布设的圈套。

你可以使用一个攻击动作来击打圈套导致它立刻被触发。如果这个圈套是你布下的，你的攻击自动命中；如果圈套是其他人布设的，你们你的这次攻击检定结果必须超过圈套的豁免DC，如果没有命中的话圈套不会被触发。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SgXvw6rzk2lhTpXL]{大型圈套 Giant Snare} 专长 10

先决条件 圈套师入门

你可以制作出布设迅速但规模相当庞大的圈套，让敌人更容易踩到它。

当你制作一个可以快速布设的圈套时，你可以选择把它们做成大型圈套。大型圈套在布设以后会占据10x10尺空间，但每一个大型圈套要占用两个你每天可以制作的临时圈套的数量。在大型圈套布设以后，生物只要进入到它的占据空间中的任何一部分都会触发这个圈套，并且在触发以后整个大型圈套的占据空间都会受到它的效果影响。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wGaxWwJhIXbMJft1]{充备圈套 Plentiful Snares} 专长 12

先决条件 圈套师入门

你可以制作出多到骇人听闻的圈套。现在你从圈套师入门专长获得的每日临时圈套制作数量翻倍。

Sniping Duo.name: 狙击小组 Sniping Duo
Sniping Duo.description:
狙击小组 Sniping Duo

那些不让自我意识妨碍工作效率的熟练射手很有可能会说狙击是两个人的工作。在不暴露你位置或给予对手报复机会的情况中拿下目标是一项困难的工作，这需要团队合作和互相协调，以及紧密的纽带和共享的观点。狙击小组成员都遵循“两个脑袋比一个脑袋好”作为其生死攸关的信条，他们的技巧和策略都是为了达致最为致命的行动效率。无论你的观测员和搭档是远程斗士还是近战狂热者，你都已经学会了如何使用他们在敌人身上造成的开口来达成毁灭性的效果。

选择观察手 Choosing a Spotter

当为狙击小组变体选择观察手时，最重要的是角色之外的因素;请确保你所选择的观察手玩家会对团体合作、成员协调及从合作中获取收益等理念感到兴奋。狙击小组的变体机制对观察手的行动要求并不高，但这并不意味着每个玩家都对其所拥有故事元素感兴趣。

从机制上讲，一个好的观察手很可能是另一个远程攻击角色或一个近战攻击角色，这取决于你所选择的观察手类型。这也令某些专长变得诱人。例如，目标重定向专长对于近战观察手来说更为有用。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 至少在一件属于弓弩或火器武器组的武器上受训，在潜行技能上受训

当你获得该入门专长时，你可以选择一个自愿的非仆从盟友作为你的观察手(Spotter)。作为你在该变体训练的一部分，你训练你的观察手一些必要的习惯和技术来自动使用你的能力;观察手不需要花费他们自己的专长便可获得这些效果。只有当你和你的观察手都活着并且清醒时，你才能从你的狙击小队专长中获得好处。在对敌人进行打击时，你和你的观察手相互之间不会给敌人提供弱效掩蔽。当你或观察手成功打击一个目标时，在另一位成员的下一回合结束前，其在针对相同目标的下一次打击伤害获得等同于其武器伤害骰数量的环境加值。你可以花费3天休整期训练其他盟友以改变你的观察手。

特殊 在你从狙击小队变体获得两个其他专长之前，你不能选择其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xtRcWpprFBiXeCOB]{三角测量法 Triangulate} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

观察手的信号协助你将困难的射击变得简单。只要你和观察手都能看见你攻击的目标，你不会因为攻击位于第二射程增量范围的目标受到射程减值。若你攻击位于第三射程增量范围的目标时受到-3射程减值，随后在第三射程增量后的每个射程增量将都使攻击受到-2减值。（第四射程增量-5，第五射程增量-7，第六射程增量-9）

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.FGdKV40UiS6jvBmI]{伤上加伤 Exploit Opening} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

触发 观察手对一个生物的打击大成功，而该生物位于你的第一射程增量范围内。

你利用观察手造成的毁灭性打击来发动你自己的后续攻击。对目标生物进行一次具有-2减值的远程打击。这次打击将不会应用你的多次攻击减值，同时在计算多重攻击减值时，这次打击不会被计算。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xqyN4Nk5mLgUm09l]{目标重定向 Targeted Redirection} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

你瞄准你的观察手射击，意图让观察手通过盾牌或武器改变射击的方向，以便从一个更好的角度击中你的敌人，并避开敌人的掩护。如果你的下一个动作是进行远程打击，将你的观察手所在位置视为你的射击位置，以重新确定掩蔽和射程。你的观察手必须在你武器的第一个射程增量内，观察手必须使用一个反应来改变你的射击方向。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pu8Mg2FIrhBYTNnB]{组合瞄准 Duo's Aim} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

在观察手的帮助下，你以相当准确的方案进行瞄准。对一个处于观察手近战触及范围或位于其所持远程武器第一射程增量范围的目标进行一次远程武器打击。在这次攻击中，你在攻击骰中获得＋2环境加值及无视其对你的隐蔽状态。若你使用具有反冲（kickback）特征的火器执行该动作时，你不会因为你不符合力量要求或没有使用三架脚时而在攻击骰中受到环境减值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qXWcmyHLkMlzRffC]{优势射击 Vantage Shot} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

你和观察手利用成员的攻击暂时躲藏起来，让敌人对你们的后续攻击措手不及。当你对一个敌人的远程打击成功时，观察手可以花费一个反应动作尝试一个潜行技能检定来对抗目标的察觉DC。如果成功，目标会到观察手的下回合结束为止对观察手的下一次攻击@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。同样的，当观察手对一个敌人的远程打击成功时，你可以花费一个反应动作尝试一个潜行技能检定来对抗目标的察觉DC。如果成功，目标会到你下回合结束为止对你的下一次攻击措手不及。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pT6r5BVJjALJUmb3]{协同效应 Tag Team} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

触发 你或观察手对一个生物的打击失败，而该生物位于另一名成员的近战触发范围或第一射程增量范围内。

你和观察手所具有的良好团队合作使你们能够在对方犹豫的时候协助对方，利用成员的失败作为攻击的机会。当你在观察手失手时使用协同效应，对目标生物进行一次具有-2减值的远程打击。当你在你自己失手时消耗反应使用该动作时，观察手可以消耗反应来对目标生物进行一次远程或近战打击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UhmPekgw2HO40zKC]{鹰眼监查 Eagle Eyes} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

你和观察手很擅长相互提防对方的情况。当你能看见或听见对方时，你们不会因为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}，无踪，比你们等级低而对你们夹击的生物或是这些生物使用突袭打击后而@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}；他们依旧可以给盟友提供夹击。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.NCsjkjEp6kHFS07h]{联合攻击 Concentrated Assault} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6PP57Aa5HmSr0qIZ]{狙击小组入门 Sniping Duo Dedication}

你和观察手一起努力将目标拿下。如果你和观察手都使用准备动作对相同的对手进行打击，并为准备动作选择相同的触发条件，则同时结算你们的攻击。你们每个人都可以使用更高的攻击骰结果，每个攻击使用自己的攻击加值;这是一种幸运效果。如果两次攻击都成功了，则将两次攻击的伤害相加，同时在计算抗力和弱点方面仅计算一次。

Soul Warden.name: 渡魂典卫 Soul Warden
Soul Warden.description:
渡魂典卫 Soul Warden

你把自己视为一名荣誉招魂者——灵魂的牧者，它们致力于确保灵魂的轮回进程完整且不受干扰。尽管你无法确保整个轮回进程的完整，但你会努力保障每个灵魂在主物质位面之时不会遭遇意外。你的工作是从禁锢中解放灵魂、阻止死灵术士唤起死灵、以及摧毁不死生物，这样就可以让它们的灵魂重返轮回。

大多数猎杀亡灵之人的行为动机是出于恐惧、复仇或者守护他人生命的愿望，但你却更加慎重以及更加理性的角度看待这一事业；你摧毁亡灵，这样它们的灵魂就会继续灵魂之河的旅途，进而确保现实的存续。你明白，如果没有灵魂的轮回，各个位面的生命循环将会被打乱，所有存在都将被大漩涡所吞噬。

近乎所有渡魂典卫都侍奉@Compendium[pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{法莱斯玛 Pharasma}或招魂者引座人中的一位，而其中以通途@Compendium[pf2e.deities.UUcAqU3KeJSMNxGF]{巴尔扎克 Barzahk}为甚，因为这名招魂者引座人经常逃避他们的职责，急需凡人中的渡魂典卫的帮助。渡魂典卫通常会加入那些经常与死灵战斗的组织，这包括尖塔之声以及乌斯塔拉夫的象牙收割者（Ivory Reapers）。

补充专长: 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.hT4INKGtly4QY8KN]{领域入门 Domain Initiate}, 魔宠 Familiar; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vQ4DNfpktmaqdgdM]{扩展领域入门 Expanded Domain Initiate}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uR44wELN9OlU68cL]{进阶领域 Advanced Domain}

灵魂轮回 THE SOUL CYCLE

灵魂的旅程起始于正能量位面，在这里，空白且空洞的灵魂与正能量的生命本质一同附着在主物质位面的凡人身上，进而形成单一的生命个体。而在凡人的生命迎来终结时，这些灵魂会进入灵界位面，通过灵魂之河来到法莱斯玛的骨园，它们在这里接受审判和分类，再前往与其相应的来世。经受审判的灵魂会抵达与其相应的位面，化身为祈并者。这些存在也会随着时间的流逝而消亡，被与其相关的位面所吸纳，而它们的精神本质会与位面结合成为名叫“精粹”的物质。但不断翻卷着的大漩涡会扯碎这些位面，将这些位面精粹散布在大漩涡自身以及相邻的位面中。而那些落在正能量位面上的碎片会最终形成新的空白灵魂，进而开启下一道轮回。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.yWawboNWFoJMVl0g]{渡魂典卫入门 Soul Warden Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 神秘或宗教的熟练度达到受训，信仰法莱斯玛或招魂者引座人

你能花费10分钟用法莱斯玛的圣徽——一道螺旋形的彗星，这代表着灵魂在其存续过程中所要踏上的蜿蜒道路——来装饰盾牌、披风、旗帜或者其他你所穿戴或持用的显眼物品。由此装饰的圣徽在1年的时间经过后才会褪色，但如果你再次以此圣徽装饰其他物品，那么先前装饰过的物品上的圣徽以及该物品上用来装饰的任何圣徽均会立即消失。该物品会化身为法莱斯玛的圣徽象征，当它被圣徽所装饰时可以被当做神术的法器来使用。

你能花费10分钟用@Compendium[pf2e.deities.QZD0u1jxwz0kj8uI]{法莱斯玛 Pharasma}的圣徽——一道螺旋形的彗星，这代表着灵魂在其存续过程中所要踏上的蜿蜒道路——来装饰盾牌、披风、旗帜或者其他你所穿戴或持用的显眼物品。由此装饰的圣徽在1年的时间经过后才会褪色，但如果你再次以此圣徽装饰其他物品，那么先前装饰过的物品上的圣徽以及该物品上用来装饰的任何圣徽均会立即消失。该物品会化身为法莱斯玛的圣徽象征，当它被圣徽所装饰时可以被当做神术的法器来使用。

每当有不死生物或受困的灵魂出现在距离该物体100尺范围内时，螺旋图案便会发光，在10尺半径范围内散发出昏暗的蓝光。若该生物藏匿或灵魂被藏起来了，那么它们必须成功以@Check[type:stealth|dc:resolve(10+@actor.attributes.perception.value)]检定对抗你的察觉DC，才能够欺骗印记，防止螺旋图案发光。

此外，你能以神术内在戏法来随意施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kcelf6IHl3L9VXXg]{打击死灵 Disrupt Undead}。与通常情况一样，该戏法会自动升阶至你的等级的一半（向上取整）。若你还未获得施法行动，那么你变得可以使用该行动。你在神术法术攻击检定和法术DC上的熟练度为受训。你在这些法术上的关键施法属性为感知。

当你至少在该变体中选取另外2个专长后，螺旋图案在发光时会在10尺半径范围内发出明亮的光（并在向外延伸的10尺内发出昏暗光芒）。那些需要生物或物体身处光亮之中的专长，在你的螺旋图案散发的光芒中也可生效，无论他们是位于光亮亦或者昏暗光照区内。

特殊 直至选取另外两个渡魂典卫变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EsA2F4R3UwUdI8Px]{轮回之术 Cycle Spell} 专长 4

先决条件 渡魂典卫入门

你献身于灵魂轮回的事业使得你获得了额外的神术。从@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.XSujb7EsSwKl19Uu]{祝福术 Bless}、@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2iQKhCQBijhj5Rf3]{毁灭武器 Disrupting Weapons}或@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal}中选择。你必须在选取该专长时作出该选择，且该选择无法更改。每日一次，当你的螺旋图案发光时，你能以神圣内在法术来施放上述所选择的法术。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.GkPbsX5RZWyI0qFj]{招魂者魔宠 Psychopomp Familiar} 专长 4

先决条件 渡魂典卫入门, 魔宠

你的魔宠变为带着面具的招魂者——灵魂轮回的跨位面守护者。该魔宠继续使用与其他魔宠相同的规则，但是它的能力之一必须为说话，且它会具有观察者和招魂者特征。如常规规则一般，当某个魔宠必须具有某些特定能力时，说话能力会被计入到你的魔宠每日所要选取的能力之中。

你每日可以选取3个魔宠或主人能力，而非原本的2个，但其中之一必须是后文中的这些召唤者魔宠能力中的一种。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.o0fxDDUu2ZSWYDTr]{灵魂视域 Soul Sight} 你的魔宠获得30尺范围的生命感知（lifesense）。.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.nrPl3Dz7fbnmas7T]{灵魂之触 Spirit Touch} 你的魔宠能够碰触到虚体生物。若你通过魔宠获得了法术传递主人能力，那么由你的魔宠传递的任何法术都会获得@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch}性能符文的好处。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8rKzUpDxAi8tMk7I]{解放灵魂 Liberate Soul} 专长 6

先决条件 渡魂典卫入门

频率 1次/小时

需求 你的螺旋图案发光了

你的法莱斯玛圣徽散发出的光芒能够粉碎那些禁锢灵魂的束缚。你尝试反制一个占据效果，一个囚困灵魂的效果、物体或法术（比如@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{缚魂术 Bind Soul}、锢魂宝石或者被囚魂魔吞食的灵魂）。

你与被占据的生物或物体、或者囚困灵魂的容器间的距离不得超出60尺。你的反制等级等同于你的等级的一半（向上取整），你的反制调整值为你的神术法术DC - 10。若你的尝试失败了，则除非环境产生了巨大的变化（由GM判断），否则你无法再次使用解放灵魂对抗某个特定效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ef57tIj30IaPnSgC]{螺旋誓言 Spiral Sworn} 专长 6

先决条件 渡魂典卫入门

频率 1次/10分钟

你在向法莱斯玛吟诵祈祷词的同时在空中绘出螺旋的痕迹，从而在一段时间内获得她的祝福。于3轮之内，你在对抗不死生物、被囚困的灵魂所占据的生物、或者你过去目击到的曾创造或命令不死生物的生物时，你的打击和法术会对它们造成额外伤害。你在对抗这些生物时，打击伤害上获得的状态加值等同于武器的伤害骰数量。你从法术位中施放的法术在对抗这些生物时，法术伤害上获得的状态加值等同于法术的环级；这些加值仅适用于那些能造成伤害且不具有持续时间的法术。

若你的螺旋图案发光了，则可以以一名位于光照范围内的自愿生物作为本能力的目标。若你这么做的话，该生物会取代你本人获得上述这些加值。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4HqPkJeSDpqYeGNn]{强化招魂者魔宠 Enhanced Psychopomp Familiar} 专长 8

先决条件 招魂者魔宠

你的招魂者以法莱斯玛之名继续服务，它还带来了女神的青睐。它可以改变外观，让自己看起来像是一只不同种类、且更加强大的招魂者。你每日可以选择4个魔宠或主人能力以取代原本的2个，但是其中2个必须是取自招魂者魔宠专长或者后文中的能力。

  • @Compendium[pf2e.familiar-abilities.mKmBgQmPmiLOlEvw]{卜筮术 Augury} 你的魔宠能一窥命运之线，向你提供关于你的未来的神秘线索。每日1次，你的魔宠能使用你的魔法根源以及法术DC来施放@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.41TZEjhO6D1nWw2X]{卜筮术 Augury}。你必须至少达到8级才能选取该能力。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.tBg3FZST3nX5TfLf]{护卫灵魂 Safeguard Soul} 专长 8

先决条件 渡魂典卫入门

你已经让自己的灵魂做好抵御外界干扰的准备。你在对抗死亡效果、占据效果、以及尝试操纵或窃取你的灵魂的效果时，豁免检定获得+2状态加值。你无法被任何手段转化为不死生物。当你的螺旋图案发光时，所有位于螺旋之光范围内的生物也会获得上述好处。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.L7hs5XOCbJmh0H0e]{延伸螺旋 Expand Spiral} 专长 10

先决条件 螺旋誓言

你的祷告萦绕在同伴身旁，这赋予了你将法莱斯玛的祝福分享给众人的能力。当你使用螺旋誓言（Spiral Sworn）时，你能够花费2个动作来取代原本的1个动作，以此来使得你采取该动作时，所有位于螺旋之光范围内的盟友获得螺旋誓言的好处。

Soulforger.name: 魂铸者 Soulforger
Soulforger.description:
魂铸者 Soulforger

稀有度 罕见

你对一项志业的奉使你的灵魂与武装达成了在魂魄精粹层面上的联系。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SoocjFrWNOpchTVb]{魂铸者入门 Soulforger Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 感知14或能施展神术

你可以在战斗中显现你魂魄的威能来让你意愿成真。你将一件盔甲、盾牌或武器作为你的魂铸武装显现。并为武器选择一种魂粹威能（见下列）。改变一种魂粹威能需要通过1周的重训，且当你受魂铸腐化影响时不能重训。

你可以在战斗中使用 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KMKuJ0onVS72t9Fv]{显现魂铸武装 Manifest Soulforged Armament} 来召唤你的武装。

特殊 你不能选择其他入门专长，除非你从此变体中获得了其他两个专长。

魂粹威能 ESSENCE POWERS

你的魂铸武装在你与之首次连结时会获得魂粹威能。当你显现其魂粹形态时，他会获得暂时性的威能。每一种威能都有一种腐化缺陷，若你有魂铸腐化，它就会影响你。若某种威能只适用于某种类型的武装，则会标明。

适应表象 Adaptable Persona (变化系) 仅限盔甲。当你显现魂粹形态时，你获得与你陆地速度相等的攀爬速度或游泳速度，二者选一。如果你达到8级或更高，则可以选择飞行速度。 腐化缺陷 你的所有速度受到-10尺的罚值。

魂魄羁绊 Bounding Spirit 仅限近战武器。武器获得投掷30尺特性和回力符文（即便其性能符文数量已达上限）。 腐化缺陷 当你使用投掷武器或远程武器进行攻击但未命中时，重骰这次打击，将目标改为离你最近的盟友。这次打击使用与失误的打击同样的多重攻击罚值，且此次不计入你的多重攻击罚值。

深植恐惧 Deep-Seeded Fear 你的威吓技能检定获得+2状态加值，并且当你对能感知到你武器魂粹形态的敌人进行挫败士气时，你不会因为没有使用同一种语言而承受罚值。当你显现魂粹形态时，你可以尝试对一个能感知到显现的敌人进行挫败士气。 腐化缺陷 如果你尝试对敌人进行挫败士气，也会额外将离你最近的盟友选为目标。

不动铁心 Determined Toughness 你从以下状态获得的任何状态减值比其状态值少1： @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied}。这不会改变其实际的状态值或其他效果（如呆滞状态的打断及其DC）。 腐化缺陷 当你从所列状态中获得减值时，你会额外承受相同的-1减值。

伤人怨恨 Harmful Malice (死灵系, 负能量) 你的打击额外造成1d4负能量伤害，且当武装显现时，你可以用内在法术的方式施展1道伤害术，环级为你等级的一半，向上取整。 腐化缺陷 你所造成的所有伤害均减去你的等级。

义胆雄心 Heroic Heart (惑控系, 精神) 你在攻击骰、察觉检定，技能检定与豁免上获得+1状态加值。 腐化缺陷 你在攻击骰上获得-1减值。

治愈恩典 Healing Grace (治疗, 死灵系, 正能量) 你获得相当于你等级一半的快速治疗。你可以用内在法术的方式施展一次@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]{治疗术 Heal} ，环级为你等级的一半，向上取整。 腐化缺陷 你所接受的所有治疗效果，与给予他人的法术治疗效果均减去你等级的一半。

魔法抗力 Magical Resilience (防护系) 仅限盔甲或盾牌。你对抗法术时，AC与豁免获得+2状态加值。如果你达到了5级或更高，你可以用内在法术的方式施展一次 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}。法术环级相当于你等级的一半再减去1（如你为5或6级，则法术为2环，以此类推）。 腐化缺陷 你对抗法术时，AC与豁免获得-1减值。

位面连结 Planar Bond (防护系) 仅限盔甲或盾牌。当你显现魂粹形态时，选择一种伤害类型：酸液、混乱、寒冷、电击、邪恶、火焰、善良、负能量、正能量、音波。你获得相当于你等级+2的所选伤害抗力。 腐化缺陷 你对所有伤害类型具有弱点1。

位面苦痛 Planar Pain (塑能系) 仅限武器。当你显现魂粹形态时，选择一种伤害类型：酸液、混乱、寒冷、电击、邪恶、火焰、善良、负能量、正能量、音波。你使用武器进行攻击时，其物理伤害部分变更为所选伤害类型，且伤害获得+2状态加值。 腐化缺陷 当你使用武器或无武装攻击造成伤害时，会受到2你上次所选类型的伤害，即便这种伤害类型正常情况下不会伤害你，比如你虽然不是邪恶但也会受到善良伤害。

静滞牵引 Pull of Stasis (变化系) 仅限武器。当你使用魂铸武器命中时，对方的速度会承受-10尺的罚值，持续1轮。若以大成功命中，则目标生物改为@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} 一轮。 腐化缺陷 你的所有速度承受-10尺的罚值。

魂魄反应 Reflecting Spirit 仅限盔甲或盾牌。你在对抗物理远程攻击时的AC获得+2状态加值。如若敌人的物理远程攻击没有命中你，你可使用反应立即使用那发未命中的射弹对攻击者尝试一次远程打击。 腐化缺陷 你对物理远程攻击具有弱点5。

勇毅抗争 Resolute Defiance 仅限盾牌。该盾牌在硬度上获得+2状态加值，并获得相当于你等级+2的临时生命值，直到魂粹效果结束。如果你没有 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{盾牌格挡 Shield Block} 反应，则你在盾牌显现时获得之。 腐化缺陷 当你使用举起盾牌或盾牌格挡时受到伤害，尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定。如果失败，则你手上的魂铸盾牌将会被解消，若是普通盾牌则会被丢下。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.gZrlze9HlRYEQNBG]{灵魂瞬光 Soul Flare} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SoocjFrWNOpchTVb]{魂铸者入门 Soulforger Dedication}

触发 你用魂铸武器或盾牌对一个生物的攻击未命中；或你穿戴显现的魂铸盔甲或举起魂铸盾牌时，一个生物的攻击命中你

需求 你的魂铸武装已经显现

你用纯粹的激情去努力改变结果。如果你进行攻击，你的攻击骰获得+1状态加值；如果你被攻击，你的AC获得+1状态加值。这可以改变掷骰的结果。如果这个加值使你的未命中变为命中，或者将对你的命中改为未命中，尝试一次@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定。如果你失败，则你的魂铸武装将会被解消——如果你进行攻击则是你的武器，如果你进行防守则是你的盔甲或盾牌。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.18UQefmhcNq6tFav]{迅捷显现 Rapid Manifestation} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SoocjFrWNOpchTVb]{魂铸者入门 Soulforger Dedication}

触发 你骰先攻，或一种危害攻击你

当你处于危险时，你坚定的灵魂霎时使你做好防御。你显现你的魂铸武装。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Tlqqim5TmijoPRRT]{魂铸武库 Soul Arsenal} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SoocjFrWNOpchTVb]{魂铸者入门 Soulforger Dedication}

选择另一种不同于你已选类型的魂铸武装，并为其选择一种魂铸威能。此武装的升级和更换是独立的。

当你显现魂铸武装时，你可以召唤任意数量的武装（但你必须满足每种武装的需求），以及当你解消效果时，你可以自由选择解消哪些武装而不影响其他的武装。当你使用显现动作时，可以选择显现出任意数量武装的魂粹形态。每种武装每天各只能显现一次魂粹形态。

当你获得魂铸腐化后，在阶段1时，选择一件武装并获得其腐化缺陷。在阶段2时，你获得所有魂铸武装的腐化缺陷。当你承受诅咒时，每件武装在显现魂粹形态时单独进行纯骰检定，失败骰只会阻止你显现该单件武装的魂粹形态。

特殊 你在12级或更高时可以再次选择该专长，并选择剩下来的最后一种类型。

Spell Trickster.name: Spell Trickster
Spell Trickster.description:
Spell Trickster

Just as Golarion's merchants scour busy marketplaces for newfound goods, scholars of magic congregate in teahouses, debate at symposia, and haunt the back rooms of esoteric shops to swap secrets of their trade. In such meetings, a different kind of magic may strike: the spark of innovation! The mixing of magical techniques produces fascinating and unpredictable results. As one of these innovators, sometimes called a spell trickster, you have a knack for pioneering magical techniques and discovering new effects from spells most novice spellcasters take for granted. Whether your unique abilities are the result of weeks of experimentation or a secret passed to you by a traveling practitioner, you delight in surprising others with your tricks.

The Fruits of Research

While magic can spring from many sources, from wizard tutors to self-taught savants, the art of the spell trickster often springs from sophisticated magical research. The magical academies in Golarion have no claim to magic as a whole but can often teach lesser-known variants of a spell to their students. At the Magaambya academy in the Mwangi Expanse, for instance, initiates study multiple traditions of magic, adapting the techniques of harnessing magical essence from one tradition to create new methods of casting spells in another. The Arclords of Nex have spent thousands of years honing spells in both wartime and peace, demonstrating a fine control over the arcane by effortlessly changing their magic to suit their whims. The return of New Thassilon brought thousands of magical dabblers and scholars, each with their own unique tricks and each eager to see what new spell variants have developed in their long absence.

This isn't to say that spell tricksters come solely from high academia. A sorcerer might demonstrate aberrant powers in her bloodline magic, hinting at a background more complex than a single eldritch influence acting upon her. An oracle might grope at a divine power that they poorly understand and cast a spell in a unique manner simply because they were never taught otherwise. A witch's patron or a whimsical deity might grant a favored servant a special power for whatever strange motives such beings might possess. Magic in Golarion isn't entirely predictable, no matter how many practitioners wish that it was so. While most spellcasters follow predictable patterns in their art, there are always exceptions.

The rules in this section are presented as part of an archetype, meant for a character dedicated to the art of innovating magic—but you don't have to limit yourself to this premise. At the GM's discretion, a spell trickster feat could be made available to a character as a class feat without the character taking the archetype. In most cases, this option should only be offered as a reward or story element that the character, GM, or group has dedicated a significant amount of time to developing—a character who wishes to partake in these options without GM permission or involvement should simply take the spell trickster archetype. These feats could be used to represent the payoff from extended magical research; finding forgotten or forbidden lore in a lost corner of Golarion; pleasing a god, patron, or other notable power; a magical plane or artifact exerting its influence; or any other number of situations that an adventurer might encounter while exploring. Keep in mind, however, that these feats were created and balanced to be part of an archetype. If allowing spell trickster feats as general class feats begins to negatively impact the game, the players should be willing to walk the decision back and rebuild characters as necessary.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 Able to cast spells; trained in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion

Your experience with magic and its traditions lets you specialize in the casting of certain spells, customizing familiar spells to create novel effects. Whenever you gain a feat from this archetype, you either learn to modify the effects of a single spell, or you change one of the modifications from a previous feat. Each time you Cast the Spell corresponding to the feat you chose, you decide whether to cast its normal or modified version. You can only apply one modification to a spell at a time, even if you know more than one modification for that spell. Besides modifications mentioned in the feat, the spell functions as normal.

Choose up to two 4th-level spell trickster archetype feats for which you meet the spell-casting prerequisite. You gain those feats, ignoring their level prerequisite.

特殊 直至选取另外两个spell trickster archetype. The two feats you gain from taking the dedication don't count toward this total.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jZbhRBR2yawntSmd]{Agile Hand} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}

When you cast mage hand, you can modify its target to be a set of thieves' tools. When you Cast the Spell in this way, the tools move up to 20 feet towards a device or lock. After you Sustain the Spell on future turns, you can use the tools to attempt Thievery checks to Disable a Device or Pick a Lock within the spell's range, but you take a -2 penalty to your Thievery check. If you critically fail, the spell ends and you can't use this modification again for 24 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Xjn4iYzJ6rLIpLV3]{Barrier Shield} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}

When you cast shield, you can modify the spell to create a solid barrier you can use for cover, but not for blocking. You can't use the Shield Block reaction when the spell is modified in this way, but you (and only you) can spend an action to Take Cover to gain standard cover from it.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SASOvOG2Nqs2ekdA]{Forceful Push} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.pwzdSlJgYqN7bs2w]{Mage Hand}

When you cast mage hand, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace its standard effects with the following: You push your foe telekinetically. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortitude DC. On a success, you push the target 5 feet away from you. On a critical success, you push the target 10 feet away from you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iAziUKdxgy4k4ypY]{Shining Arms} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WBmvzNDfpwka3qT4]{Light}

When you cast light, you can modify its target to be 1 melee weapon, either unattended or possessed by you or a willing ally, and modify its duration to be 1 minute. If you do, add the following to its effects: When a creature wielding the weapon critically hits a foe, you can Dismiss the Spell as a reaction, causing the foe to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. After you use this reaction, you can't use this modification again for 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CX4ISbBwndRWhP55]{Summon Ensemble} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.yvs1zN5Pai5U4CJX]{Summon Instrument}

When you cast summon instrument, you can modify its duration to be sustained, up to 1 minute. When you do, you summon a number of instruments equal to your spellcasting ability modifier that hover around you and play of their own accord. Once per turn when you Sustain the Spell, choose an opponent within 30 feet who can hear your performance. The target must attempt a Will save against the spell's DC; on a failure, it becomes distracted by your performance and becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round. The target is then temporarily immune for 24 hours.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dtt6xTOSF8PuoStg]{Tracing Sigil} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.AUctDF2fqPZN2w4W]{Sigil}

When you cast sigil, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: The target leaves a magical trail that you and others can try to follow. You and other creatures can attempt to Track the target, substituting an Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion check (whichever matches the magical tradition of your sigil spell) for the Survival check. Much like Tracking with Survival, this must take place somewhere the target has been and follow the trail; it doesn't allow anyone to find the target from a distance. You can only have a single target marked with a modified sigil in this way. If you use this ability again on a second target, the sigil spell on the first target ends, and your mark fades.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BQkqUrlUVNFp8BEq]{Wild Lights} 专长 4

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.kl2q6JvBZwed4B6v]{Dancing Lights}

When you cast dancing lights, you can modify its duration to be 1 minute and modify its standard effects to create a single floating light in the shape of a Tiny creature, instead of up to four floating lights. The creature hovers over your head unless you spend a single action that has the concentrate trait to direct the light to move up to 30 feet, in which case it remains there until you direct it again. If you direct it back to your head, it hovers there and follows you again until you direct it elsewhere. If the light ever moves beyond 120 feet of you, it winks out immediately.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bi9w4Z9MQY8VWLZF]{Animate Net} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.rVANhQgB8Uqi9PTl]{Animate Rope}

When you cast animate rope, you can modify its target to be 1 net. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You cause a net to animate and throw itself at a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet of the net. Attempt a spell attack roll against the target's Reflex DC. On a success, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it Escapes; on a critical success, it's also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until it Escapes. The Escape DC is equal to your spell DC as long as the spell lasts. Once the spell ends, the Escape DC returns to the normal DC for a net (usually 16), and a creature adjacent to the target can Interact to remove the net.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.V3lFDAQr3PfnAxMC]{Confounding Image} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.j8vIoIEWElvpwkcI]{Mirror Image}

When you cast mirror image, you can modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute and modify its range to 30 feet. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You create an illusory duplicate of yourself that appears in an unoccupied square within range. The image takes up space and has a reach of 5 feet, and your allies can flank with the image. It doesn't have any other attributes a creature would normally have other than an AC equal to your spell DC and saving throw modifiers equal to your spell DC - 10. If the image is hit by an attack or fails a save, or if you ever move more than 30 feet from it, the spell ends. Creatures can move through its space without hindrance. When you Sustain the Spell, you can move the image to an unoccupied square within range.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UEbBOljjXvKsGKFu]{Disk Rider} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.LvezN4a3kYf1OHMg]{Floating Disk}

When you cast floating disk, you can modify its duration to be sustained, up to 10 minutes. If you do, add the following heightened entry to its effects.

Heightened (3rd) The disk can hold up to 10 Bulk. The spell no longer ends if you ride atop the disk (though it does if any other creature rides atop it, including if the creature is riding on you). If you are riding the disk, it changes its capacity to hold you, plus additional Bulk equal to the maximum you could carry without being encumbered. If you ride atop the disk, you can direct it to move along the ground up to 30 feet or your Speed, whichever is slower, each time you Sustain the Spell. While you ride atop it, the disk can move over liquids as long as it ends its movement on solid ground. If it ends its movement on a surface that can't support it, the spell ends.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.6vpgAMj87J6cWN0j]{Drenching Mist} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}

When you cast obscuring mist, you can modify it to add the following heightened entry to its effects.

Heightened (3rd) Your mist is particularly laden with moisture. Non-magical fires within the area are automatically extinguished. Choose one magical fire or fire spell in the area and attempt to counteract it.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wHwjoK3E1Ot9kkV0]{Obscured Terrain} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}

When you cast obscuring mist, you can modify the spell to replace its standard effects with the following: You cause a cloud of thick fog to blanket the area, making it difficult to see the ground. The area within the fog is difficult terrain for creatures that can't see through fog or mist. You can Dismiss the cloud.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.J06CgMzMDGOahXjf]{Uneasy Rest} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{Sleep}

When you cast sleep, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Subjects of your spell experience troubled dreams. When a target that failed or critically failed its saving throw wakes up, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vKFg7HMNu4cCDD8b]{Volatile Grease} 专长 6

先决条件@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Wu0xFpewMKRK3HG8]{Grease}

When you cast grease, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: You splash the target with combustible grease. The target must attempt a Reflex save.

大成功 The target is unaffected.

成功 The target is splattered with grease and gains weakness 2 to fire until the end of your next turn. The target or an adjacent creature can rub off the combustible grease with an Interact action, ending the effect.

Failure As success, except the weakness to fire lasts for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The weakness increases by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YYPjndZ7tqRQLtAH]{Beacon Mark} 专长 8

Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dtt6xTOSF8PuoStg]{Tracing Sigil}

When you cast sigil, you can modify the spell to add the following heightened entry.

Heightened (4th) You attune yourself to the marked target. While the spell lasts, you can spend a single action, which has the concentrate, detection, and divination traits, to attempt to locate the target, learning the direction to the target as long as you are within 1 mile of it. If the target is a creature or a creature is in possession of the target object, the creature can attempt a Will saving throw against your spell DC. If it succeeds, your attempt to locate the target fails and you can't attempt this again for 1 day. You can only have a single target marked with a sigil modified in this way. If you Cast this Spell again on a second target, the sigil spell on the first target ends, and your mark fades.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dCoX0TfsasMfwYnz]{Larcenous Hand} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jZbhRBR2yawntSmd]{Agile Hand}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jDdOqFmZLwE4dblQ]{Pickpocket} skill feat

When you cast mage hand, you can remove its duration, modify its range to 20 feet, and modify its target to be an attended object within the spell's Bulk limit that wouldn't be time-consuming to remove. Add the following to the spell's standard effects: If the creature attending the object is willing to have you take the item, mage hand carries the item to you. If the creature is unwilling, you must attempt to Steal the target object with a Thievery check. The usual restrictions on attempts to Steal an object apply, including the restrictions that you can't steal objects that would be extremely noticeable or time-consuming to remove (like worn shoes or armor or actively wielded objects) and you can't Steal from a creature in combat or otherwise on guard. On a successful Steal check, the mage hand carries the item to you, and on a critical failure, you can't use this modification again for 1 hour. If you're a master in Thievery, you can attempt to Steal from a creature in combat or otherwise on guard, though if you do so, the spell's casting time increases by 1 action.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.505CCsBRft1P53gP]{Lingering Flames} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}

When you cast fireball, you can modify its effects, decreasing the base damage to 5d6 and causing it to deal 2 persistent fire damage to creatures that fail their save, doubled as normal on a critical failure. If you do, replace its heightened entry with the following.

Heightened (+1) The damage is increased by 1d6 and the persistent fire damage is increased by 2.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.cDNxHLIgvyD7yBfM]{Scattered Fire} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}

When you cast fireball, you can modify its area to be two non-overlapping @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10-foot bursts}.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Yj0IKXM49Ver5Smc]{Siphoning Touch} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.N1Z1oLPdBxaSgrEE]{Vampiric Touch}

When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet. After 1 minute, the ally loses any of these temporary Hit Points that remain.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sCkzwTBLyE8FdzWI]{Smoldering Explosion} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}

When you cast fireball heightened to at least 4th level, you can modify the spell to add the following to its standard effects: Your fireball leaves behind a brief cloud of smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of obscuring mist, except that it lasts only 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XoxawV3Fmn61VJcS]{Steal Vitality} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.N1Z1oLPdBxaSgrEE]{Vampiric Touch}

When you cast vampiric touch, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining temporary Hit Points, if your target fails or critically fails its saving throw, you can attempt a counteract check to remove the clumsy or enfeebled conditions on yourself, using the source of that condition to determine the counteract level and DC. If the condition was caused by an ongoing effect and you don't remove that effect, the condition returns at the end of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PlRAfeNof3xgJttZ]{Surrounding Flames} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IarZrgCeaiUqOuRu]{Wall of Fire}

When you cast wall of fire, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of a 5-foot-thick, 10-foot-radius ring of flame, you can form the wall into a 10-foot-radius hemisphere of fire.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.s0P4JXagA3085wLW]{Toppling Tentacles} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication} ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.2w4OpAGihn1JSHFD]{Black Tentacles}

When you cast black tentacles, replace the spell's standard effects with the following: Tentacles slither along the ground in the area, attempting to hinder anyone within. Sticky black tentacles attempt to Trip each creature in the area. Attempt spell attack rolls against the Reflex DCs of each affected creature. Any creature you succeed against is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes [[/r {3d6}[bludgeoning]]]{3d6 bludgeoning damage}. Whenever a creature ends its turn in the area, the tentacles attempt to Trip that creature if it isn't already prone, and they deal [[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6 bludgeoning damage} to any creature already prone. @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.XWmlGnFNfxyJWw9V]{Choking Smoke} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sCkzwTBLyE8FdzWI]{Smoldering Explosion}

When you cast fireball heightened to at least 6th level, you can modify the spell's standard effects as follows: Reduce the spell's damage by 6d6. Your fireball leaves behind a lingering cloud of toxic smoke in its area. While it's smoke instead of mist, this cloud otherwise has the effects of stinking cloud.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.07YYaQBknzDTcbFz]{Directed Poison} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.CbqaiI0TKsyDywDr]{Spell Trickster Dedication}, ability to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill}

When you cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.MlpbeZ61Euhl0d60]{Cloudkill}, modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute, and modify its standard effect to include the following: The cloud doesn't move away from you each round. Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud 10 feet in the direction of your choice.

Spellmaster.name: Spellmaster
Spellmaster.description:
Spellmaster

Those who train under the Master of Spells concern themselves with all matters related to magic. Though not all members of the School of Spells are spellcasters, those who would become Spellmasters of the highest rank and influence have at least some spellcasting capabilities.

Pathfinder Society Archetypes

The following archetypes are uncommon, but are available to members of the Pathfinder Society. Qualifying characters with the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.o3C85NHW08Y2inAN]{Pathfinder Agent} archetype can select one of these dedication feats even if they have not gained three feats from the Pathfinder agent archetype, and each of these archetypes' feats fulfills the Pathfinder Agent Dedication's special requirement despite not being from the Pathfinder agent变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vuApM8xHOZs4o6oS]{Spellmaster Dedication} 专长 6

先决条件 智力, Wisdom, or 魅力 14; ability to cast focus spells; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells

As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you Identify Magic with a skill in which you are trained or better. If you have the Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer feat, you can change the cantrip you chose for that feat each day during your daily preparations.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Spellmaster变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EGtuOZ3E9y0qZ1oJ]{Familiar Form} 专长 8

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.CHZQJg7O7991Vl4m]{Familiar Form} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.qUBr1YsQw3BSNy9c]{Glyph Expert} 专长 8

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

You've learned to recognize the telltale writings and other signs that indicate the presence of magical traps. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to find magical traps, to AC against attacks made by magical traps, to saves against magical traps, and to checks to Disable magical traps. Even if you aren't Searching, you get a check to find magical traps that normally require you to be Searching. You still need to meet any other requirements to find the trap. You're also adept at avoiding the effects of traps that feature magical writing, such as runes, glyphs, ancient script, or other forms. When you attempt a saving throw against the effects of these traps, if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead. If you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fHWYICk6cSePr30c]{Surreptitious Spellcaster} 专长 8

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

You've learned that it pays for a Pathfinder to be able to cast spells without being noticed. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sIeuPW0j39fTZm08]{Conceal Spell} wizard class feat, though it's not a wizard feat for you. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Conceal a Spell and to Deception checks to conceal verbal components.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9Qn5E7Ujye9KdxOj]{Recover Spell} 专长 10

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

需求 An enemy's action disrupted your attempts to Cast a Spell since the beginning of your last turn.

You recover the energy of a recently disrupted spell, allowing you to cast it again as long as you do so immediately before the energy dissipates. You regain the use of a spell that was disrupted since the beginning of your last turn, but you must immediately Cast the Spell again with your next action or else you lose the spell; as normal for metamagic, this must be on the same turn that you use Recover Spell. You can change the area, targets, and other variables, including the number of actions used to Cast the Spell if the spell allows, such as when casting Heal or Magic Missile.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.YdGHQjhUrNvP18AA]{Spellmaster's Ward} 专长 10

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

You can create a number of powerful shielding runes that bolster your defenses against damaging spells by absorbing the worst of the energy to keep you safe. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VrhCpCIQB8PFax77]{Spellmaster's Ward} focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Qjn9ErWY6wuIK9z6]{Ward Casting} 专长 10

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication, Steady Spellcasting

触发 You attempt a flat check for Steady Spellcasting, but you haven't rolled yet.

You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell. You reduce the DC of the flat check for Steady Spellcasting from 15 to 10.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.a2wXdQHiIoj3lHoe]{Communal Sustain} 专长 12

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

Frequency once per round

Choose one spell with a sustained duration that one of your allies has in effect. You must be within 30 feet of the chosen ally. The ally can Sustain the Spell once as a free action, triggered at the start of their next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dWkf6LhYBfBkeyOA]{Spellmaster's Resilience} 专长 12

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

Your experience with a specific type of harmful magic makes you more resistant to it. Choose a magical tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells and effects with that tradition's trait and resistance 5 to all damage from spells and effects with that tradition's trait. The effect must have actually been cast or created with that tradition, rather than simply being on that tradition's spell list.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bEdFgywri7fABhBT]{Absorb Spell} 专长 14

Frequency once per 10 minutes

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication, spell repertoire or ability to prepare spells

触发 You critically succeed at a saving throw against a foe's spell, and that spell is of a level you can normally cast.

You absorb a spell and store it in your body. If you are a spontaneous spellcaster, you can cast the triggering spell once during the next 10 minutes, even if it's not on your spell list as if it were in your repertoire. If you are a prepared spellcaster, you can replace one of your prepared spells of the same level with the absorbed spell, but you must cast the absorbed spell within 10 minutes or you lose that spell slot for the day. You cast the spell at the same spell level as the spell you absorbed, but the spell is of your magical tradition and uses your spell DC, spell attack roll, and other statistics to determine its effects.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lPoP5TFfq266kR6g]{Spellmaster's Tenacity} 专长 14

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

Frequency once per day

触发 You critically fail at a saving throw against a foe's spell, and that spell was cast or created with the tradition of magic you selected with the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dWkf6LhYBfBkeyOA]{Spellmaster's Resilience} feat.

You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way. You fail your saving throw instead of critically failing. For 1 minute, increase the circumstance bonus to saving throws from the Spellmaster's Resilience feat to +2, and increase the resistance to damage it grants to 10.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.EDdJFwarNIJIkP2E]{Master's Counterspell} 专长 16

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication, master in spell attack rolls and spell DCs

触发 A creature Casts a Spell that you have prepared, and that spell was cast or created with a tradition of magic in which you have master proficiency in spell attack rolls and spell DCs.

When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it. If you're a prepared caster, you can expend a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of a spell. If you're a spontaneous caster, you can expend a spell slot. The level of the prepared spell or spell slot must be at least as high as the triggering spell's level. You lose your prepared spell or spell slot as if you had Cast the Spell. You then attempt to counteract the triggering spell, and you take a -2 penalty to your counteract check; for prepared casters, the GM might waive the penalty if the spell you're expending to counterspell is especially appropriate-such as countering with the same spell, or using a Cone of Cold to counteract a Fireball.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.AyP23H3WJkEAIEKd]{Mobile Magical Combat} 专长 16

先决条件 Spellmaster Dedication

需求 You're wielding a melee weapon and have Cast a Spell requiring at least 1 action this turn.

You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon. Stride once. If you end your movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, you can make a melee Strike against that enemy. You can use Mobile Magical Combat while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.S3hN7qK7aiCDTrpM]{Retain Absorbed Spell} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bEdFgywri7fABhBT]{Absorb Spell}

When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly-potentially for a greater period of time. If you're a spontaneous caster, you can cast the triggering spell up to three times instead of once. If you're a prepared spellcaster, you can replace up to three of your prepared spells of the same level with the absorbed spell instead of one. Either way, you can choose to retain the absorbed spell for the next hour instead of the next 10 minutes; if you choose to extend the absorption to an hour, you can't use Absorb Spell again until one hour after the spell is absorbed.

Spellshot.name: 魔弹射手 Spellshot
Spellshot.description:
魔弹射手(职业变体) Spellshot (Class Archetype)

稀有度 罕见

魔弹射手并非寻常的普通枪客。他们是群被现代的发明和看法锻炼出来的具有古老秘密和原则的枪客。魔弹射手将魔法力量融入了用枪的艺术之中，创造出一个独特神秘的枪客之道，对于这个世界上的其他枪客而言，他们是神秘又无法理解的。最先认定他们自己是魔弹射手的人们，将他们的魔法传统绑定到了阿卡迪亚上星辰准则和冠冕学者的历史上。一群古老隐居被称为冠冕学者的工匠创造出了星辰枪，一种发射白炽的能量爆炸的传奇魔法火器。星辰枪的持用者们被星辰准则（一套文化期望定义了当一个人使用这种强大的武器应有的表现）绑定在了一起。你可以在《枪械全书》中找到更多有关于星辰枪、冠冕学者和星辰准则的资讯。

绝大多数的魔弹射手都将持续地来自阿卡迪亚，因为那些描述相关技能与训练的故事早已在那块地方代代相传了。许多在这个地区成长的枪客都在年轻时听过这些故事，而他们也因此依靠模仿冠冕学者的奥秘手段发展出利用他们的武器来引导魔法能量的能力。尽管阿卡迪亚是魔弹射手们最主要的起源地，但是这种技术也逐渐缓慢的流传到其他地区。不过在内海地区，因为魔弹射手们独特的历史以及和阿肯斯塔的大公这位存在于法力废墟中死魔地区的联系，依然是特别稀罕的存在。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{魔弹射手入门 Spellshot Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.OmgtSDV1FubDUqWR]{魔弹射手之道 Way of the Spellshot}

你踏入了魔法与枪战的世界之中，以至于你能凭空召唤子弹出来，这是使用初级的奥法理论知识制造出的临时弹药。你获得@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.KC6o1cvbr45xnMei]{召唤子弹 Conjure Bullet}动作。

特殊 你不能选择除了魔兽枪手(Beast Gunner)以外的入门专长，直到你从魔弹射手或是魔兽枪手的变体中选择了两个或更多的专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.o3J79hnr00ztcwtT]{爆发射击 Fulminating Shot} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{魔弹射手入门 Spellshot Dedication}

频率 每轮一次。

你引导强力的魔力到你下一发攻击上，用爆裂的能量强化。选择酸蚀、寒冷、电击或是火焰。如果你在你的这一轮结束前使用火器或弩在下一次打击命中时，你造成[[/r {1d6}[additional]]]{1d6你选择能量的额外伤害}。在12级时，这个额外伤害增加到[[/r {2d6}[additional]]]{2d6额外伤害}，而在18级时增加到[[/r {3d6}[additional]]]{3d6额外伤害}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SE38R6zpv2XelzZk]{召唤枪支 Call Gun} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{魔弹射手入门 Spellshot Dedication}

你和你选择的枪支或弩之间创造出了一个强而有力的魔法链接，使得你获得一个可以从任何地方召回自己的武器到手上的能力。在你每日准备的时候，选择一把弩或火器。直到你下一次每日准备之前，你都可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ESMIHOOahLQoqxW1]{召唤枪支 Call Gun}的动作将你已经选择的武器召唤到你的手上。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nY8HtHNJMqP0hz3v]{相位子弹 Phase Bullet} 专长 14

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{魔弹射手入门 Spellshot Dedication}

频率 每日一次

你不仅可以在正常的维度中瞄准，你现在甚至可以在额外的维度瞄准敌人。这让你可以发射一个穿越除了你的目标之外一切东西的魔法子弹。进行一次针对观察到或是@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}（但并非未察觉）的敌人的弩或火器的打击。这发弹药会穿越非魔法的屏障或墙壁以一条直线命中你的目标，魔法性的墙壁或屏障会阻挡下这发子弹。这次射击无视一切的掩体、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}状态、藏匿状态以及来自盾牌的环境AC加值。这发子弹对任何穿盔甲的生物具有+4状态加值。这次打击的伤害不能被使用非魔法盾牌的盾牌格挡反应减少。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pWbNhfBiskV4n58a]{黑火药现影术 Black Powder Embodiment} 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BwDIwjHasZwcd61Z]{魔弹射手入门 Spellshot Dedication}, 奥法熟练度达到专家

需求 你正在持用已经装填的魔法火器或弩。

你将你整个存在注入到这一发射击之中。你将你的身体合并到了爆发之中，使你能顺着弩矢或子弹的路径传送。使用需求的武器对一个生物进行打击。成功时，如果目标在120尺内，你和你全部的装备会传送到目标附近10尺的由你选择的开阔空间。

Staff Acrobat.name: Staff Acrobat
Staff Acrobat.description:
Staff Acrobat

You can perform amazing acts in and out of combat when you have a spear, staff, or polearm.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.LoeoiYOpxSaEkWKv]{Staff Acrobat Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 敏捷16; trained in Acrobatics; trained in Athletics; trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as 'your staff')

When you High Jump, Leap, or Long Jump while wielding your staff, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to any Athletics check required and add 5 feet to the distance you can Leap vertically and horizontally. You can Shove and Trip even if you don't have a free hand, provided you are wielding your staff. Finally, when you roll a success on a check to Balance while wielding your staff, you get a critical success instead.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the staff acrobat变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iMh9Ve8Kt8ZcdKU0]{Bullying Staff} 专长 4

先决条件 Staff Acrobat Dedication

需求 You are wielding your staff.

You can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you. If you have master proficiency with your staff, you can attempt to Shove or Trip creatures up to three sizes larger than you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.dPmJ91qawZW2U8K3]{Staff Sweep} 专长 6

先决条件 Staff Acrobat Dedication

需求 You are wielding your staff.

You sweep your foes away with your staff. Roll an Athletics check to Shove or Trip, and compare the result to the appropriate DCs of up to two foes, each of whom must be within your reach and no more than 5 feet apart.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jIMeialR9CBo1bx9]{Levering Strike} 专长 8

先决条件 Staff Acrobat Dedication

需求 You are wielding your staff.

Make a Strike with your staff. As long as you don't critically fail, the target becomes flat-footed and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its DC against Shove, Trip, and Tumble Through attempts until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.wZZyasfIqwiJBQAQ]{Whirlwind Stance} 专长 10

先决条件 Staff Acrobat Dedication, expert proficiency in your staff

需求 You are wielding your staff, which must have the parry trait.

You use your staff as a defensive implement as well as an offensive one. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC as long as you remain in this stance.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RnxullWsNdbU7fuH]{Pivot Strike} 专长 14

先决条件 Staff Acrobat Dedication

需求 You are wielding your staff.

You Leap and then Strike using your staff. You gain a circumstance bonus to damage for the Strike equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice. Regardless of whether your Strike hit, you can then attempt to Shove or Trip the target.

Sterling Dynamo.name: 纹银机铠士 Sterling Dynamo
Sterling Dynamo.description:
纹银机铠士 Sterling Dynamo

稀有度 罕见

格拉利昂不乏义肢使用者，不过你身上装的可是最先进的战斗用发条义肢－－名为纹银机铠（sterling dynamo）的尖端科技。你懂得该如何保养纹银机铠，也知道怎么照个人品味和需求调校，或是结合前景看好的新科技。

艾巴萨罗姆和顿加堡的义肢市场上原本就有许多新奇的产品，但纹银机铠技术刚问世不久，就很快成了义肢使用者的首选。不过有些人只是选用了纹银机铠义肢，而你跟他们不一样，你是货真价实的纹银机铠士。

要成为一名纹银机铠士除了要装备纹银机铠外，还要深入了解纹银机铠的优势、限制以及它无限的潜力。使用纹银机铠并不需要特别擅长工艺，所以你未必要真的自己身兼技师；即便如此，你还是可以「感觉」到什么时候应该调校和改进你的机铠。无论你是自己执行改进，还是把你的创见和观察告诉技师，请他们代为实现你的想法，这种体能与巧思的结合，才是你身为纹银机铠士的特别之处。

随着你逐渐适应穿戴着机铠从事各种冒险，你也会办到开发者当初作梦也想不到的成就。事实上，如果你持续精进此变体，并探索机铠的可能性，总有一天发明人也会想拜访你，以便汲取你的洞见，打造更卓越的下一代产品。纹银机铠灵活的调适空间，意味着这种技术拥有无穷潜力。有朝一日，穿戴者说不定只要伸手就能碰到天！

格拉利昂的义肢科技 Prosthetics in Golarion

在格拉利昂，使用义肢并不需要选择变体或是加入特别的组织。角色可以用5银币轻易买到普通的人工手脚、假眼或任何人造器官，如果花更多钱也可以买到客制化或特殊设计的义肢。更多有关义肢的资讯，可见于《预言破灭之年：大巴扎》（Pathfinder Lost Omens Grand Bazaar）第69页，〈莫伦的行动助件〉（Mohren's Mobility Apparel）一章。此处的纹银机铠义肢技术是结合了由一名顿加堡义肢发明家，以及一名艾巴萨罗姆发条大教堂研究员的发明。前者创造了银质的弹性发条关节系统，后者借此打造了原形，并强化了这项科技的客制化空间。他将自己的发明寄到了顿加堡，以便那位矮人发明家可以进一步改良。后续一连串改良的结果，就是AR4721年问世的纹银机铠。这项能够适应战斗和日常生活的技术立刻受到了广大的赞誉。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication} 专长 2

你获得一副纹银机铠义肢，可以用来取代或强化肢体，甚至是增添新的肢体，比如一条尾巴。纹银机铠可以用来代替手臂等失去的抓握肢，但如果你的目的是增添新肢体，请注意就算合并其他能力或效果，也无法靠纹银机铠让角色的手或抓握肢增加到两只以上。

你的纹银机铠是专为了战斗特别设计，这让你获得近战非武装攻击机铠（dynamo）；机铠属于搏击武器组，且由银制成，因此在对抗魔鬼和狼人等特定生物时特别有效。

此外，你的纹银机铠还有一些客制化选项。首先，选择你的机铠是出力强化型还是精准打击型。前者造成[[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害}，并拥有推撞特征。后者造成[[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4钝击伤害}，并拥有灵巧及娴熟特征。多数机铠都能自动作业，和其他非武装攻击一样，无须空出一只手操作。不过你可以选择将机铠改为手动式，以手动开关、拉杆等装置来操作；用手动式机铠攻击时，你必须空出一只手来操作，这样做的好处是控制起来更灵活，而且破坏力更强。机铠的伤害骰会上升一级，让强化出力型变成1d8，精准打击型变成1d6。机铠手臂一定是手动式的，且只需用这副机铠本身的手掌就能操作它进行打击。只有在战斗中才需要特别动手控制机铠，冒险或日常生活中其他比较省力的行动并不需要。

纹银机铠需要上发条才能使用，不过过程并不复杂，所以在多数时候都不成问题。只要你花一分钟帮机铠上好发条，它就能保持启动，直到24小时过后才需要再次上发条。不过，敌人可以对机铠尝试解除装置。此时机铠的等级和你的角色等级相同，成功的话，机铠的运作时间将减少1小时，大成功则会减少2小时。某些对科技造成不利影响的能力，也能减少机铠的运作时间。运作时间耗尽的机铠仍可以像普通的义肢一样使用，但在重新上发条之前，你不能继续用机铠进行非武装攻击，也不能使用这个变体的其他能力。你随时可以花一分钟帮机铠上发条，让运作时间恢复24小时的最大值。

特殊 在你从纹银机铠士变体中获得另外两个专长以前，你不能选择另一个入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.sVEF7j9Wh1KNGPUm]{模组化机铠 Modular Dynamo} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

你的机铠采用模组化结构，可以因应战斗中的各种状况，轻易切换成不同用途。你的机铠获得模组化特征，并从下列构造中选择其一：出力强化（[[/r {1d6}[bludgeoning]]]{1d6钝击伤害}；猛推）、精准打击（[[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4钝击伤害}；灵巧、娴熟）、旋转镰刃（[[/r {1d6}[slashing]]]{1d6挥砍伤害}；摔绊）或倒刺缠钩（[[/r {1d6}[piercing]]]{1d6穿刺伤害}；擒抱）。如果你拥有手动机铠，这些功能的伤害骰可以如常上升一级；此外你还可以选择伸缩长棍（[[/r {1d4}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4钝击伤害}；娴熟、触及），此数值已计入伤害骰升级后的影响。

你可以用一个交互动作，在获得纹银机铠士入门专长时挑选的起始结构，和选取模组化机铠专长时挑选的新结构之间切换。

特殊 你可以多次选取此专长。每次选取时请挑选另一个结构，并加入以互动行动切换模组时的选项清单中。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0SbHdwYumvmzwWw3]{活塞重拳 Piston Punch} 专长 6

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

你延伸机铠，用一记重拳攻击直线上的两个生物。进行一次钝击或穿刺伤害的机铠打击，将攻击检定结果和最多两个敌人的AC比较。第一个敌人必须在你的近战触及范围内，第二个敌人必须紧邻第一个敌人，且两个敌人必须和你连成一直线。伤害骰只投掷一次，并适用于所有命中的生物。活塞重拳在计算多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击，并且会耗掉纹银机铠一小时的运作时间。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.A0keRhzNlcB1u4gD]{高压线圈 Stasian Smash} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

获取许可 你来自乌斯塔拉夫（Ustalav）

你在自己的机铠上使用了乌斯拉塔夫的史黛西亚线圈（Stasian coil），以便发出劈啪作响的强力电击。用进行一次打击。成功时，这次打击对目标造成额外的[[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12点电击伤害}；电火花还会四处飞舞，对10尺内最多两名敌人造成[[/r {1d4}[electricity]]]{1d4电击伤害}。如果这次机铠打击掷出大失败，你自己会受到[[/r {1d12}[electricity]]]{1d12电击伤害}。在计算多重攻击减值时，这算作两次攻击。到了18级，目标所受的额外电击伤害会增加到2d12，其他敌人所受的额外电击伤害则会增加到[[/r 2d4]]{2d4}。这招会耗掉纹银机铠一小时的运作时间。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K0x90HNHi5hONdDl]{魔兽机铠咆吼 Beast Dynamo Howl} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

获取许可 你来自阿卡狄亚（Arcadia）

你在机铠上结合了阿卡狄亚的魔兽科技，用各种可怕生物的器官来增强义肢的能力。在你用机铠使出强力攻击的同时，魔兽的器官也会发出骇人的咆吼。进行一次威吓检定，对30呎内的每个敌人使用挫败士气；如果有生物不理解你的语言，这次挫败士气不会受到减值。接着用机铠进行一次打击。并将纹银机铠的运作时间减掉一个小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.xzesXSIXTqsVxm1e]{魔像机铠 Golem Dynamo} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

获取许可 你是一名灵导械（automaton），或是你来自古吉斯塔克帝国（Jistka Imperium）。

你习得了吉斯塔克魔像义肢的祕密，因此你可以在将机铠结合魔像的成份，并获得它们一部分的魔力。你在对抗魔法的豁免检定中得到+1状态加值，且你的机铠打击具有魔法特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fyJ2slL98hnQH3On]{翔空机铠 Soaring Dynamo} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fdSbB0EQVxFgLoEd]{纹银机铠士入门 Sterling Dynamo Dedication}

You've built clockwork wings or jets into your dynamo, allowing you to use your prosthesis to fly. You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Each minute of flight reduces the operational time of your sterling dynamo by 1 hour, measured from the first time you use the Fly action in a given minute.

Student of Perfection.name: Student of Perfection
Student of Perfection.description:
Student of Perfection

You studied martial arts at Jalmeray's Houses of Perfection.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.eHjqNXgylSuvA887]{Student of Perfection Dedication} 专长 2

Archetype @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.JiRqSMv1STETLwSP]{Student of Perfection}
先决条件 powerful fist or expert in unarmed attacks; member of a House of Perfection

获取许可 You are from Jalmeray.

You have learned the martial arts techniques of your House of Perfection. You become trained in your choice of Acrobatics or Athletics and Warfare Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.3a07jkWezSuORSpS]{Ki Strike} monk class feat, which grants you the ki strike ki spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point that you can recover using the Refocus activity as a monk does. Your ki spells from Student of Perfection are occult spells.

特殊 直至选取另外两个student of perfection变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Y4gYfrxjSir2Enui]{Perfect Strike} 专长 4

先决条件 Student of Perfection Dedication

You gain the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GQopUYTuhmtb7WMG]{Perfect Strike} ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aQjWHbjK1pk8HESM]{Perfect Ki Adept} 专长 6

先决条件 Student of Perfection Dedication

You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VBNevVovTCpn04vL]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.ytboJsyZEbE1MLeV]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.tvO6Kmc2pQve9DC5]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FPnkOYyWIaOzkmqn]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

Swordmaster.name: Swordmaster
Swordmaster.description:
Swordmaster

Though the ultimate goal of the Pathfinder society is to learn, knowledge cannot be spread if those who discover it fail to come back alive. The Master of Swords teaches recruits to survive, to defend other Pathfinders, and to defeat the Society's enemies. The swordmaster embodies these skills, focusing on practicality and ignoring ideals or methods that interfere with their ability to overcome any challenge.

Pathfinder Society Archetypes

The following archetypes are uncommon, but are available to members of the Pathfinder Society. Qualifying characters with the @Compendium[pf2e.archetypes.o3C85NHW08Y2inAN]{Pathfinder Agent} archetype can select one of these dedication feats even if they have not gained three feats from the Pathfinder agent archetype, and each of these archetypes' feats fulfills the Pathfinder Agent Dedication's special requirement despite not being from the Pathfinder agent变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SHpVHkPxtQggD9Cf]{Swordmaster Dedication} 专长 6

先决条件 力量, Dexterity, or Constitution 14; member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Swords

Your Swords training taught you to never lose hold of your weapon. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when foes attempt to Disarm you. If you have the Deft Cooperation feat and critically succeed on a check to Aid an ally's attack roll or skill check, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus from Deft Cooperation (instead of a +1 bonus) the first time you attempt an attack roll or attempt a skill check where the bonus would apply.

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Swordmaster变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RcQv16RK80R6c4id]{Improvised Crafting} 专长 8

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication, expert in Crafting

You've learned to repair your equipment even in challenging circumstances, making use of what you have available. You can attempt to Repair an item without a repair kit, instead improvising tools out of your gear or found items. This adds 5 minutes to the time it takes to Repair the item. You can also Repair an item while on the move without needing a stable surface. This adds 10 minutes to the times it takes to Repair the item.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.8Sdw31YToKhBJ4v4]{Physical Training} 专长 8

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication, expert in Athletics and Acrobatics

You spend a lot of time focusing on your physical fitness. You increase your proficiency rank in Acrobatics and Athletics from expert to master.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ASWqQ6RB7cfCsUo0]{Protect Ally} 专长 8

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

You place your body between your friends and your enemies, protecting your allies against oncoming attacks. You choose one adjacent ally. That ally gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn or until that ally is no longer adjacent to you, whichever comes first. You can only protect a single ally in this way. If you choose to Protect a different Ally, the previous ally loses the bonus to AC.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.i7hNUqiJsB8hgIET]{Quick Stow} 专长 8

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

You know that situations can change rapidly and might leave you needing to change equipment in the middle of combat. Your training has taught you how to swap your equipment on the fly. You Interact to stow a weapon and then Interact again to draw a readied item or weapon.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jaekke9HomT4PZ9b]{Reflexive Grip} 专长 8

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

You keep hold of your weapons even when knocked out. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC when defending against checks to Disarm you. In addition, when you fall unconscious, you don't drop any weapons that you're currently wielding, though somebody else can remove them from you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.OmjTt8eR1Q3SmkPp]{Armored Rest} 专长 10

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor

You've slept many nights in your armor and gotten used to it. You can sleep in armor overnight without being fatigued the next day. If you were already fatigued before sleeping, the armor doesn't prevent you from recovering from being fatigued.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.fCsIyglmpb7NYwiy]{Harrying Strike} 专长 10

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

Your attack prevents a foe from pursuing your allies. Make a melee Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike.

大成功 The target takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

成功 The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

Failure The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the start of your next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.lKeJruYQutWlNXyZ]{Martial Exercise} 专长 10

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords. Choose one weapon group, such as hammer or sword. Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with both simple and martial weapons of your chosen weapon group.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.vu0R9VfRZ6RWTczZ]{Practiced Defender} 专长 10

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the Defend exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9AZjpeeS824VsYv8]{Emergency Medical Assistance} 专长 12

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

After extensive practice with the Swords, you're comfortable enough with your shield to move at a normal pace with it raised. You may use the Defend exploration activity while traveling at your full travel speed instead of half your travel speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.QoPooHpBjPh1sjRD]{Recollect Studies} 专长 12

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication, expert in a skill used to Recall Knowledge

需求 You're fighting a creature of your level or lower that could be identified by Recall Knowledge with a skill in which you're an expert.

You paid attention during your studies and remember the right way to attack various creatures. Choose a creature that meets the requirements. You learn the resistances, immunities, or weaknesses of the creature (your choice) without needing to successfully Recall Knowledge.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.m7AOg13xEJRHyoTt]{Rugged Survivalist} 专长 12

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication, master in Survival

You've studied survival skills with the School of Swords experts and are comfortable spending long periods of time in the wilderness. You don't get fatigued more quickly due to precipitation during overland travel, though you can otherwise be fatigued as normal. You can go 3 days + your Constitution modifier without water before you take damage from thirst and you can go 5 days + your Constitution modifier without food before you take damage from starvation.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Oa41bfBRO36lf1aE]{Shoulder Catastrophe} 专长 12

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

触发 An enemy critically succeeds at a Strike against an adjacent ally.

You've trained to protect your allies by diverting the worst attacks to yourself. The enemy doesn't double the damage from the triggering Strike but instead applies the normal damage to both you and your ally. Both of you take any effects that would happen on a hit that dealt damage, such as poison, but neither of you are subject to any effects that would happen only on a critical success.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K5pXeeJLmdE8XuvM]{Tense Negotiator} 专长 12

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication, master in Diplomacy

You often find that the best way to win a conflict means avoiding a fight in the first place. You're good at talking to potential opponents without making things worse. If you would critically fail at a check to Make an Impression, you instead fail. You can attempt checks to make Requests of creatures who're indifferent or unfriendly toward you.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.9zfcIXDG2mDpiypp]{Armored Exercise} 专长 14

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication; trained in light, medium, or heavy armor

You've spent time training in your armor alongside other agents from the Swords. Your proficiency rank for light, medium, and heavy armor increases to expert for whichever of those you already had the trained proficiency rank in.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PSpwdvuddC9kXONz]{Death's Door} 专长 14

Frequency once per 10 minutes

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

触发 You take damage that would reduce you to 0 Hit Points.

You continue to fight when others would fall. Just before taking the triggering damage, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level. If you have Hit Points remaining after gaining these temporary Hit Points, you aren't knocked unconscious, nor do you suffer the other effects of being reduced to 0 Hit Points. Any temporary Hit Points that remain after applying the damage last for up to 4 rounds.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0qL4a3CarG1e0pfB]{Forceful Shot} 专长 14

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

Your ranged attacks push your foes away from your allies. Make a ranged Strike, adding the following effects in addition to the normal effects of the Strike.

大成功 The target is pushed 10 feet away from you.

成功 The target is pushed 5 feet away from you.

Failure The target is flat-footed for 1 round.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zodscjgydZRUSOLO]{Focus Ally} 专长 16

先决条件 Swordmaster Dedication

触发 An adjacent ally fails, but doesn't critically fail, a saving throw against an effect with the incapacitation trait.

You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight. Your ally rerolls the failed saving throw. That ally must take the second result.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.rmO7FP410nvCjFBB]{Stave off Catastrophe} 专长 18

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Oa41bfBRO36lf1aE]{Shoulder Catastrophe}

You fully protect your allies from the worst blows. When you use the Shoulder Catastrophe reaction, you can choose to take the full critical damage and effects from the attack, including effects that apply on a critical hit, and have your ally take no damage and avoid the attack's effects.

Talisman Dabbler.name: 魔玩家 Talisman Dabbler
Talisman Dabbler.description:
魔玩家 Talisman Dabbler

在人们的刻板印象中，“施法者”往往是一个一脸死大学生样的法师，翻着大部头法术书吟唱魔法咒语。但你知道真正的魔法可远不止如此。只要你有强大的意志力、做出正确的手势、再加上一大堆具有魔力的小玩意，你就可以把长剑的每一次挥舞变成一道法术。于是，你的装备上总是挂满了乱七八糟的魔法护符。不过至少在需要的时候，你总是能挑出最需要的那一件来完美地发挥它的效用。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1t5479E6bdvFs4E7]{魔玩家入门 Talisman Dabbler Dedication} 专长 2

你惯于使用护符和其他类似的临时性魔法物品。也许你是研究这一类魔法的专业学者，或者只是从民间智慧中汲取了足够多的经验和技艺。总之，你现在可以制作护符，并且你懂得所有在 核心规则书 中出现的，稀有度为常见的护符的设计图。这些设计被你牢牢地记在脑子里，所以你不需要纸面上的设计图来参考如何制作护符。

除此之外，你还总是随身带着许许多多可以随时拼凑成魔法护符的零碎玩意。每天在你的每日准备阶段中，你可以制作出两件物品等级不高于你的等级数一半的护符，前提是你记得它们的设计图。这样制作出来的护符是临时性的它们的魔力会在你的下一次每日准备时消散——如果你没有用掉它们的话。

最后，如果你要@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{附着一件护符 Affix a Talisman}，你可以在10分钟时间内同时附着或移除最多4件护符。

特殊 直至选取另外两个魔玩家变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.RlhvppSmQRqL2RUe]{快速附着 Quick Fix} 专长 4

先决条件 魔玩家入门

你可以使用一点胶水加上几根线迅速地整治好一件护符。你获得 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.x9xA8P2Vlz98He7C]{快速附着 Rapid Affixture} 技能专长，即使你未满足获得此专长的先决条件。当你使用本专长时，你可以只需要1分钟时间就同时附着或是移除4件护符。

在12级时，无论你的手艺技能熟练等级为何，你只需要一个3动作行动就能@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{附着一件护符 Affix a Talisman}。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.PTXZ2C3AV8tZf0iX]{高端玩家 Deeper Dabbler} 专长 8

先决条件 魔玩家入门

你优化了制作护符的流程并更为深入地理解了制作护符所需的材料，这让你可以每天制作出更多护符。你现在可以在每日准备阶段多制作两件临时护符。

特殊 在14级以后，你可以重复选择一次本专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uPikeCzrTrgzEJT8]{护符巨匠 Talismanic Sage} 专长 14

先决条件 魔玩家入门

你从大脑里忘记的护符样式可能比某些冒险者一辈子了解到的都要多。通常，如果你在同一件物品上附着了超过一件护符，那么这会使得除了一件以外的其他护符无法生效。但是，现在当你为物品 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.UAaQk93a30nx0nYY]{附着护符 Affix a Talisman}时，你可以特别改造一件物品，让它能够同时容纳两个激活的护符。

这个效果会一直持续到你下一次使用附着护符动作改造一件新的物品为止。

Trapsmith.name: 陷阱工匠 Trapsmith
Trapsmith.description:
陷阱工匠 Trapsmith

稀有度 罕见

携带着扳手和喷灯，你制作出呼呼滴滴作响具有极高精确性的陷阱。你的杰作需要恰到好处的材料——一套光彩夺目的铜质配件和齿轮——使用它们制作出优雅且致命的隐秘陷阱。作为一名陷阱工匠，你们总是能改良你的陷阱：调整计时器，扭紧触发器，然后找一个让敌人难以发现的新方式隐藏他们。

即使你没有从圈套师变体中获得三个专长，你也可以选择陷阱工匠变体的入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.4MUbwilvb9dI0X59]{圈套师入门 Snarecrafter Dedication}或@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0haS0qXR9xTYKoTG]{圈套专家 Snare Specialist}游侠职业专长

你使用油亮的齿轮与紧密咬合的机械装置来制作采用了特殊结构的圈套。你的陷阱包含了发条、蒸汽驱动的嵌齿轮与齿轮，并且其涌动的蒸汽可以妨碍那些你诱捕的家伙。如果你选择构造一个采用了机械结构的圈套并且一个生物在对抗圈套的豁免骰上失败时，因为一阵蒸汽遮蔽了其视线，所以持续一轮所有生物都对此生物视作隐蔽。

特殊 直至选取另外两个陷阱工匠或圈套师变体专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.7Hx0i4VchvwrIOV5]{机械咬合 Gear Gnash} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication}, 手艺技能专家级熟练度

你制作的圈套具备复杂的内部构造从而十分难以被解除。尝试解除你采用机械结构圈套的生物必须在一次额外的贼活检定中成功才能得以解除圈套。一旦失败，虽然圈套不会被完全触发，其碾磨装置对生物造成等同于你等级一半数值的钝击伤害。一旦大失败，圈套依然会如常被触发。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UkMG3wMvrw8X0I98]{螺桨装置 Propeller Attachment} 专长 7

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication}, 手艺技能大师级熟练度

你已掌握了将发条螺桨安装在每日你迅速设置的采用机械结构圈套上。这使你得以将你的圈套放置在空中或水下，他们会停留在原地最多10分钟，之后螺桨耗尽了动力然后坠落或者沉没。除非你使用额外防护措施来隐藏它，一个螺桨圈套的位置总是可见的。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.WmSggxmf4iAe2aRD]{回收齿轮 Recycled Cogwheels} 专长 8

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication}

你能够从每日你迅速设置的采用机械结构圈套上拾取齿轮。这使你得以拆除一个圈套并不触发从而放置圈套到别的地方。使用放置圈套时所用同样数量的动作。当你完成时，你回收圈套并且可以在别的地方部署它。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UJcQgQpZRqXBw0Nb]{重装组件 Repurposed Parts} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication}

你对你圈套的齿轮和配件十分熟悉，并且可以将来自于你准备用于迅速设置的每日迅速设置圈套部分凭空重制组装成一个新的发明。使用两个在你每日准备时准备用于迅速设置的圈套，你可以快速放置一个你知道如何制作的不同圈套，即使你没有在你每日准备时准备的圈套。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.k9B7gDit3pXbq2XF]{功能完善 Finessed Features} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uT9RnHLgIIcm7Hhs]{陷阱工匠入门 Trapsmith Dedication}

你学会了如何制作一个基于视觉触发的圈套。当你构建了一个采用机械结构圈套，你可以让它基于一个生物的视觉特征来触发。例如，你可以放置一个只会被大型或更大体型的生物触发，或者一个只有身穿红色服装的生物才能触发的陷阱。你可以使用这个能力来特化你的圈套让一般不会触发的生物触发圈套，例如小或更小体型生物，但是生物依然必须在其他方面满足圈套通常的触发条件。

Trick Driver.name: 特技机师 Trick Driver
Trick Driver.description:
特技机师 Trick Driver

稀有度 罕见

当骑士们还在遵从古老且陈旧的骑乘作战传统时，你走上一条更加现代化的道路。通过激进的载具使用方式，你席卷战场，碾倒对手。远不止是简单地操控载具，你将载具发挥出其制作者从未设想的惊人技艺，让其远不再是单纯的运输工具。

使用载具 Using Vehicles

本书中的许多选项并不常见，很难作为合适的主题元素插入到您的游戏中，您需要仔细考虑是否要将一些选项加入游戏。本变体就是其中之一。载具相对复杂，移动速度极快，这让地图遭遇的发生变得困难。他们也能让角色移动到过远的地方，以至于其他参战者无法有效响应。在允许选取特技机师前务必三思，并确保载具的使用与你战役的整体风格以及遭遇模式下的地图大小能否互相配合。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication} 专长 2

你熟悉于驾驶任何载具，任何的控制方式、移动和操作你都能迅速适应。驾驶任何需要航空学识（Piloting Lore）或航海学识（Sailing Lore）检定的载具，你都可以使用你的驾驶学识（Driving Lore）熟练度作为替代。当使用驾驶学识进行操作检定，你可以使用敏捷而非智力调整值。你在驾驶学识上获得专家熟练度。在7级时，你的驾驶学识变为大师熟练度并且在15级时，你在驾驶学识上获得传奇熟练度。

特殊 直至选取另外两个特技机师变体专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.K2R1xGTgBnSCDMUl]{特快机师 Express Driver} 专长 2

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}

你提升载具的性能，巧妙利用额外速度并选择一条无需减速的道路。在计算你每日旅行速度时，只要你驾驶一架载具，你可以进行一次驾驶学识检定以增加你载具的旅行速度。其DC由GM决定，但是一般基于载具的驾驶DC以及在更加恶劣环境下的困难度。一旦成功，增加数值等同于你载具一半旅行速度的速度。在遭遇中，其对你的载具行动没有影响。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.z3ycxqT1XvjfQ0Oq]{掌控方向 Take the Wheel} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}

需求 你与载具搭乘点相邻

跳入一辆行动中的载具并获取控制权对你来说习以为常。你@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bG91dbtbgOnw7Ofx]{搭乘 Board}并@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.yh9O9BQjwWrAIiuf]{接管 Take Control}相邻的载具。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SXXyAwe9FGBwhJIW]{强行转向 Power Slide} 专长 4

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}

需求 你正在驾驶一辆载具

你让载具达到了失控边缘，急速转向以逃脱追击或让你的武器得以开火。在操作检定中，你的@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{驾驶 Drive}动作获得-2减值，获得等同于你强行转向中所花费动作数量的驾驶动作效果。在移动结束时，如果你成功了，你可以将载具最多转向90度。如果你在你的操作检定中大成功，取而代之你可以将载具转向最多180度。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.UaCHd5SpYsZwf2hM]{突破其极 Push It} 专长 7

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}, 驾驶学识大师级熟练度

你让载具性能超越了其制作者所设想的极限。无论何时你在操作检定中成功，直到回合结束前你所驾驶载具的所有速度获得+5尺环境加值。如果你大成功，加值增加到+10尺。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.ts2A1XeuPRzaCZgA]{公路杀手 Roadkill} 专长 10

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}

需求 你正在驾驶一辆载具

在你手中，任何载具都是武器。当你使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.lID4rJHAVZB6tavf]{碾压 Run Over}时，你可以用你的职业DC取代载具碰撞DC（collision DC）。你的载具可以碾压任意数量至多体型比载具小1阶的生物，或者冲撞你路径上最多和你载具同体型的目标。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Eg7YZBmeNJeY9wkD]{驾驶攻击 Drive-By Attack} 专长 12

先决条件 @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.1hyC4aiLMBSwM9Z1]{特技机师入门 Trick Driver Dedication}

需求 你正在驾驶一辆载具

你可以无需中断驾驶的同时流畅组织攻击。你进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{驾驶 Drive}，获得等同于你驾驶攻击中所花费动作数量的驾驶动作效果。在你驾驶载具移动的任何时候，你进行打击。

Turpin Rowe Lumberjack.name: Turpin Rowe Lumberjack
Turpin Rowe Lumberjack.description:
Turpin Rowe Lumberjack

You are a feller of trees and a skilled axe wielder, trained in the art of forestry by the hard-working loggers of Turpin Rowe.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.0icxuITlxUBfeomX]{Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication} 专长 2

先决条件 trained in Survival

获取许可 You must befriend at least one Turpin Rowe logger.

Your logging training has made you intimately familiar with all aspects of forestry, and you have trained extensively to reach around trees and utilize their bulk to your advantage. You become trained in Milling Lore and Forest Lore, or an expert if you were already trained. You can always Take Cover when you are within forest terrain to gain cover, even if you're not next to an obstacle you can Take Cover behind. In addition, any enemy who gains standard cover from a tree gains only lesser cover against your attacks (or only standard cover, if the enemy otherwise gains greater cover).

特殊 You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Turpin Rowe lumberjack变体的专长之前，你无法再选择任何其他入门专长。

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.nAgAICjPd4BSQlAj]{Axe Climber} 专长 4

先决条件 Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication

When you are climbing a wooden surface and have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.LGgvev6AV0So8tP9]{Hatchet} or @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.War0uyLBx1jA0Ge7]{Battle Axe} in each hand, you have a climb Speed equal to half your normal Speed. You must still have both legs available to climb and can't use either of the axes in combat while climbing. This feat can also be used to climb a surface of ice if you have a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.RbM4HvPyrZ4YJxRc]{Light Pick} in each hand.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.SjJ8BOy5sc8p2H5E]{Log Roll} 专长 4

先决条件 Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication

需求 You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is flat-footed.

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the adjacent creature's Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.pewPAMlURmTqBqJx]{Axe Thrower} 专长 6

先决条件 Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication

You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease. Any one-handed axe weapon you wield has the thrown trait with a range of 10 feet. For axes that already have the thrown trait, the range increases by 10 feet. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with a thrown axe weapon, you apply the axe's critical specialization effect.

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.mnhsG4l53YJkJIeY]{Widen the Gap} 专长 10

Once you have penetrated a foe's defenses, you can home in on the same spot to exploit your opponent's wound and deal some serious damage. The second time you hit and deal damage with a melee axe Strike to the same opponent or object during your turn, you ignore half of the opponent's or object's Hardness, if any. If you hit and deal damage with a melee axe Strike to the same opponent or object a third or fourth time during your turn, you ignore all of its Hardness, if any.

Undead Master.name: Undead Master
Undead Master.description:
Undead Master

Not everyone with an interest in the undead raises a vast army of faceless, disposable minions. You prefer to cultivate a more personal relationship with a small number of undead companions, personalized to your needs and expectations. Those companions with minds trust you implicitly; those without are extensions of your will. Perhaps they see you as a teacher or caretaker, shepherding them on the path to peace and passing on, or perhaps they are your protectors, bound to aid you by negotiation and magical spells. Whatever the case, they will fight for and alongside you without question, throwing themselves into danger without hesitation if it will provide a means to your desired end. This archetype works well for a necromancer capable of raising undead but isn't exclusive to them. You could be a warrior who befriended an undead, an evil champion granted an undead companion by your deity, or an undead bloodline sorcerer undead are drawn to. The additional feats below are found in the beastmaster archetype on pages 160-161 of the Advanced Player's Guide. Whenever one of these additional feats refers to an animal companion, as an undead master, you apply it to your undead companion instead.

Additional Feats: 4级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zBLrZE5aCkpaTK2N]{Additional Companion}，@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uCElsebJ45ltmZMT]{Mature Beastmaster Companion}; 6级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.TORYSZMLMAGgsSEW]{Companion's Cry}; 8级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.aEws1NR19Lbu1Kio]{Incredible Beastmaster Companion}; 14级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bki36RiEM5FR4aiT]{Specialized Beastmaster Companion}; 16级@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Aeea44xyJqYArFun]{Lead The Pack}

@Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.M6cWLywN0aWnX5Gl]{Undead Master Dedication} 专长 2

Prerequisites evil alignment You gain the services of an undead companion that travels with you and obeys your commands. The rules for undead companions appear on page 37 and utilize those for animal companions from the Core Rulebook on page 214. Contrary to the usual rules for companions, as an undead master it's possible for you to have more than one undead companion at a time. However, only one of those companions, your "active companion," follows you during exploration and encounters; the rest are reduced to an "inactive" state that can be easily tucked into an inventory or stored in a nearby crypt. If you ever have more than one undead companion, you gain the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.8kGpUUUSX1sB2OqQ]{Call Companion} action, with your undead companions taking the place of animal companions.
